GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.01a: / mūrtitve parikalpitaḥ śaśa bhṛto vartmā apunar janmanām ātmā ity ātma vidāṃ kratuś ca yajatāṃ bhartā amara jyotiṣām/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.01b: / lokānāṃ pralaya udbhava sthiti vibhuś ca anekadhā yaḥ śrutau vācaṃ naḥ sa dadātv aneka kiraṇas trailokya dīpo raviḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.02a: / bhūyobhiḥ paṭu buddhibhiḥ paṭu dhiyāṃ horā phala jñaptaye śabda nyāya samanviteṣu bahuśaḥ śāstreṣu dṛṣṭeṣv api/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.02b: / horā tantra mahā arṇava prataraṇe bhagna udyamānām ahaṃ svalpaṃ vṛtta vicitram artha bahulaṃ śāstra plavaṃ prārabhe//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.03a: / horā ity aho rātra vikalpam eke vāñchanti pūrva apara varṇa lopāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.03b: / karma ājitaṃ pūrva bhave sad ādi yat tasya paṅktiṃ samabhivyanakti//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.04a: / kāla aṅgāni vara aṅgam ānanam uro hṛt kroḍa vāso bhṛto bastir vyañjanam ūru jānu yugule jaṅghe tato aṅghri dvayam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.04b: / meṣa aśvi prathamā nava ṛkṣa caraṇāś cakra sthitā rāśayo rāśi kṣetra gṛha ṛkṣa bhāni bhavanaṃ ca eka artha sampratyayāḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.05a: / matsyau ghaṭī nṛ mithunaṃ sa gadaṃ sa vīṇaṃ cāpī naro aśva jaghano makaro mṛga āsyaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.05b: / taulī sa sasya dahanā plavagā ca kanyā śeṣāḥ sva nāma sadṛśāḥ sva carāś ca sarve//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.06a: / kṣitija sita jña candra ravi saumya sita avanijāḥ/sura guru manda sauri guravaś ca gṛha aṃśakapaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.06b: / aja mṛga tauli candra bhavana ādi nava aṃśa vidhir bhavana sama aṃśaka adhipatayaḥ sva gṛhāt kramaśaḥ//(troṭaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.07a: / kuja ravija guru jña śukra bhāgāḥ pavana samīraṇa kaurpi jūka leyāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.07b: / ayuji yuji tu bhe viparyayasthaḥ śasi bhavana ali jhaṣa antam ṛkṣa saṃdhiḥ//(puṣpitāgrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.08a: / kriya tāvuri jituma kulīra leya pāthona jūka kaurpyā ākhyāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.08b: / taukṣika ākokero hṛd rogaś ca antya bhaṃ ca ittham//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.09a: / dreṣkāṇa horā nava bhāga saṃjñās triṃśa aṃśaka dvādaśa saṃjñitāś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.09b: / kṣetraṃ ca yady asya sa tasya vargo horā iti lagnaṃ bhavanasya ca ardham//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.10a: / go aja aśvi karki mithunāḥ sa mṛgā niśā ākhyāḥ pṛṣṭha udayā vimithunāḥ kathitās ta eva//
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.10b: / śīrṣa udayā dina balāś ca bhavanti śeṣā lagnaṃ samety ubhayataḥ pṛthu roma yugmam//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.11a: / krūraḥ saumyaḥ puruṣa vanite te cara aga dvi dehāḥ prāg ādi īśāḥ kriya vṛṣa nṛyuk karkaṭāḥ sa tri koṇāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.11b: / mārtaṇḍa indvor ayuji sama bhe candra bhānvoś ca hore dreṣkāṇāḥ syuḥ sva bhavana suta tri tri koṇa adhipānām//(mandākrāntā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.12a: / ke cit tu horāṃ prathamāṃ bhapasya vāñchanti lābha adhipater dvitīyām/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.12b: / dreṣkāṇa saṃjñām api varṇayanti sva dvādaśa ekādaśa rāśipānām//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.13a: / aja vṛṣabha mṛga aṅganā kulīrā jhaṣa vaṇijā ca divākara ādi tuṅgāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.13b: / daśa śikhi manu yuk tithi indriya aṃśais tri navaka viṃśatibhiś ca te asta nīcāḥ//(puṣpitāgrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.14a: / varga uttamāś cara gṛha ādiṣu pūrva madhya paryantataḥ śubha phalā nava bhāga saṃjñāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.14b: / siṃho vṛṣa prathama ṣaṣṭha haya aṅga tauli kumbhās tri koṇa bhavanāni bhavanti sūryāt//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.15a: / horā ādayas tanu kuṭumba sahottha bandhu putra ari patnī maraṇāni śubha āspada āyāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.15b: / riḥphā ākhyam ity upacayāny ari karma lābha duścikya saṃjñita gṛhāṇi na nityam eke//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.16a: / kalpa sva vikrama gṛha pratibhā kṣatāni cittottha randhra guru māna bhava vyayāni/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.16b: / lagnāc caturtha nidhane caturasra saṃjñe dyūnaṃ ca saptama gṛhaṃ daśama ṛkṣam ājñā//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.17a: / kaṇṭaka kendra catuṣṭaya saṃjñāḥ saptama lagna caturtha kha bhānām/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.17b: / teṣu yathā abhihiteṣu bala āḍhyāḥ kīṭa nara aṃbu carāḥ paśavaś ca//(dodhaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.18a: / kendrāt paraṃ paṇapharaṃ paratas tu sarva bha āpoklimaṃ hibukam ambu sukhaṃ ca veśma/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.18b: / jāmitram asta bhavanaṃ tri koṇaṃ meṣūraṇaṃ daśamam atra ca karma vidyāt//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.19a: / horā svāmi guru jña vīkṣita yutā na anyaiś ca vīrya utkaṭā kendrasthā dvi pada ādayo ahni niśi ca prāpte ca saṃdhyā dvaye/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.19b: / pūrva ardhe viṣaya ādayaḥ kṛta guṇā mānaṃ pratīpaṃ ca tad duścikyaṃ sahajaṃ tapaś ca navamaṃ try ādyāṃ tri koṇaṃ ca tat//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.20a: / raktaḥ śvetaḥ śuka tanu nibhaḥ pāṭalo dhūmra pāṃḍuś citraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kanaka sadṛśaḥ piṅgalaḥ karburaś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_01.20b: / babhruḥ svacchaḥ prathama bhavana ādyeṣu varṇāḥ plavatvaṃ svāmy āśā ākhyaṃ dina kara yutād bhād dvitīyaṃ ca veśiḥ//(maṃ krāṃ)E1
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.01a: / kāla ātmā dina kṛn manas tuhinaguḥ satvaṃ kujo jño vaco jīvo jñāna sukhe sitaś ca madano duḥkhaṃ dina īśa ātmajaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.01b: / rājānau ravi śītagū kṣita suto netā kumāro budhaḥ sūrir dānava pūjitaś ca sacivau preṣyaḥ sahasra aṃśujaḥ//(śa vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.02a: / heliḥ sūryaś candramāḥ śīta raśmir hemno vij jño bodhanaś ca indu putraḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.02b: / āro vakraḥ krūra dṛk ca avaneyaḥ koṇo mandaḥ sūrya putro asitaś ca//(śālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.03a: / jīvo aṅgirāḥ sura gurur vacasāṃ patījyaḥ śukro bhṛgur bhṛgu sutaḥ sita āsphujic ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.03b: / rāhus tamo agur asuraś ca śikhī iti ketuḥ paryāyam anyam upalabhya vadec ca lokāt//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.04a: / rakta śyāmo bhās karo gaura indur na atyucca aṅgo rakta gauraś ca vakraḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.04b: / dūrvā śyāmo jño gurur gaura gātraḥ śyāmaḥ śukro bhās kariḥ kṛṣṇa dehaḥ//(śalinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.05a: / varṇās tāmra sita atirakta harita vyāpīta citra asitā/bahūny ambv agnija keśava indra śacikāḥ sūrya ādi nāthāḥ kramāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.05b: / prāg ādyā ravi śukra lohita tamaḥ saura indu vit sūrayaḥ kṣīṇa indv arka mahī suta arka tanayāḥ pāpā budhas tair yutaḥ//(śā vi )
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.06a: / budha sūrya sutau napuṃsaka ākhau śaśi śukrau yuvatī narāś ca śeṣāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.06b: / śikhi bhū kha payo marud gaṇānāṃ vaśino bhūmi suta ādayaḥ krameṇa//(troṭaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.07a: / vipra āditaḥ śukra gurū kuja arkau śaśī budhaś ca ity asita antyajānām/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.07b: / candra arka jīvā jña sitau kuja arkī yathā kramaṃ satva rajas tamāṃsi//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.08a: / madhu piṅgala dṛk caturasra tanuḥ pitta prakṛtiḥ savitā alpa kacaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.08b: / tanu vṛtta tanur bahu vāta kaphaḥ prājñaś ca śaśī mṛdu vāk śubha dṛk//(troṭaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.09a: / krūra dṛk taruṇa mūrtir udāraḥ paittikaḥ sucapalaḥ kṛśa madhyaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.09b: / śliṣṭa vāk satata hāsya rucir jñaḥ pitta māruta kapha prakṛtiś ca//(svāgatā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.10a: / bṛhat tanuḥ piṅgala mūrdhaja īkṣaṇo bṛhaspatiḥ śreṣṭha matiḥ kapha ātmakaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.10b: / bhṛguḥ sukhī kānta vapuḥ sulocanaḥ kapha anila ātma asita vakra mūrdhajaḥ//(vaśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.11a: / mando alasaḥ kapila dṛk kṛśa dīrgha gātraḥ sthūla dvijaḥ paruṣa roma kaco anila ātmā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.11b: / snāyv asthy asṛk tvag atha śukra vase ca majjā manda arka candra budha śukra surejya bhaumāḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.12a: / deva ambv agni vihāra kośa śayana kṣity utkara īśāḥ kramāt/vastraṃ sthūlam abhuktam agnika hataṃ madhyaṃ dṛḍhaṃ sphāṭitam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.12b: / tāmraṃ syān maṇi hema yukti rajatāny arkāc ca mukta ayasī/ dreṣkāṇaiḥ śiśira ādayaḥ śa śu ruca jña gv ādiṣu udyatsu vā//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.13a: / tri daśa tri koṇa caturasra saptamāny avalokayanti caraṇa abhivṛddhitaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.13b: / ravija amarejya rudhirāḥ pare ca ye kramaśo bhavanti kila vīkṣaṇe adhikāḥ//(pra rṣi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.14a: / ayana kṣaṇa vāsara ṛtavo māso ardhaṃ ca samāś ca bhās karāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.14b: / kaṭuka lavaṇa tikta miśritā madhura āmlau ca kaṣāya ity api//(vaitāliya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.15a: / jīvo jīva budhau sita indu tanayau vyarkā vibhaumāḥ kramād vīndv arkā vikuja indv ināś ca suhṛdaḥ keṣāṃ cid evaṃ matam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.15b: / satya ukte suhṛdas tri koṇa bhavanāt svāt sva antya dhī dharmapāḥ sva ucca āyuḥ sukhapāḥ sva lakṣaṇa vidher na anyair virodhād iti//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.16a: / śatrū manda sitau samaś ca śaśijo mitrāṇi śeṣā raves tīkṣṇa aṃśur hima raśmijaś ca suhṛdau śeṣāḥ samāḥ śītagoḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.16b: / jīva indu uṣṇa karāḥ kujasya suhṛdo jño ariḥ sita arkī samau mitre sūrya sitau budhasya himaguḥ śatruḥ samāś ca apare//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.17a: / sūraḥ saumya sitāvarī ravi suto madhyo apare tv anyathā saumya arkī suhṛdau samau kuja gurū śukrasya śeṣāvarī/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.17b: / śukrajau suhṛdau samaḥ sura guruḥ saurasya ca anye arayo ye proktāḥ sva tri koṇa bha ādiṣu punas te amī mayā kīrtitāḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.18a: / anyonyasya dhana vyaya āya sahaja vyāpāra bandhu sthitās tat kāle suhṛdaḥ sva tuṅga bhavane apy eke arayas tv anyathā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.18b: / dvy eka anukta bhapān suhṛt sama ripūn saṃcintya naisargikāṃs tat kāle ca punas tu tān adhisuhṛn mitra ādibhiḥ kalpayet//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.19a: / sva ucca suhṛt sva tri koṇa nava aṃśaiḥ sthāna balaṃ sva gṛha upagataiś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.19b: / dikṣu budha aṅgirasau ravi bhaumau sūrya sutaḥ sita śīta karau ca//(dodhaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.20a: / udag ayane ravi śīta mayūkhau vakra samāgamagāḥ pariśeṣāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.20b: / vipula karā yudhi ca uttara saṃsthāś ceṣṭita vīrya yutā parikalpyāḥ//(dodhaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.21a: / niśi śaśi kuja saurāḥ sarvadā jño ahni ca anye/bahula sita gatāḥ syuḥ krūra saumyāḥ krameṇa//
GS41brhajj_u:bj_02.21b: / dvy ayana divasa horā māsapaiḥ kāla vīryaṃ śa ru bu gu śu ca sādyā vṛddhito vīryavantaḥ//E2
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.01a: / krūra grahaiḥ subalibhir vibalaiś ca saumyaiḥ klībe catuṣṭaya gate tad avekṣaṇād vā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.01b: / candra upaga dvi rasa bhāga sa māna rūpaṃ satvaṃ vaded yadi bhavet sa viyoni saṃjñaḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.02a: / pāpā balinaḥ sva bhāgagāḥ pārakye vibalāś ca śobhanāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.02b: / lagnaṃ ca viyoni saṃjñakaṃ dṛṣṭvā atra api viyonim ādiśet//(vai lī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.03a: / kriyaḥ śiro vakra gale vṛṣo anye pāda aṃśakaṃ pṛṣṭham uro atha pārśve/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.03b: / kukṣis tv apāna aṅghryā atha meḍhra muṣkau sphik puccham ity āha catuṣpada aṅge//(u jā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.04a: / lagna aṃśakād graha yoga īkṣaṇād vā varṇān vaded bala yuktā dvi yonau/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.04b: / dṛṣṭyā sa mānān pravadet sva saṃkhyayā rekhāṃ vadet smara saṃsthaiś ca pṛṣṭhe//(vaiśvadevī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.05a: / khage dṛkāṇe bala saṃyutena vā graheṇa yukte cara bha aṃśaka udaye/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.05b: / budha aṃśake vā vihagāḥ sthala aṃbujāḥ śanaiścara indv īkṣaṇa yoga saṃbhavāḥ//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.06a: / horā indu sūri ravibhir vibalais taruṇāṃ toye sthale taru bhava aṃśa kṛtaḥ prabhedaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.06b: / lagnād grahaḥ sthala jala ṛkṣa patis tu yāvāṃs tāvanta eva taravaḥ sthala toya jātāḥ//(va ti )
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.07a: / antaḥ sārāñ janayati ravir durbhagān sūrya sūnuḥ kṣīra upetāṃs tuhina kiraṇaḥ kaṇṭaka āḍhyāṃś ca bhaumaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.07b: / vāg īśa jñau sa phala viphalān puṣpa vṛkṣāṃś ca śukraḥ snigdhān induḥ kaṭuka viṭapān bhūmi putraś ca bhūyaḥ//(mandāprāṃtā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.08a: / śubho śubha ṛkṣe ruciraṃ kubhūmijaṃ karoti vṛkṣaṃ viparītam anyathā//
GS41brhajj_u:bj_03.08b: / para aṃśake yāvati vicyutaḥ svakād bhavanti tulyās taravas tathā vidhāḥ//(vaṃśastha)E3
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.01a: / kuja indu hetuḥ pratimāsam ārtavaṃ gate tu pīḍa ṛkṣam anuṣṇa didhitau/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.01b: / ato anyathāsthe śubha puṃ graha īkṣite nareṇa saṃyogam upaiti kāminī//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.02a: / yathā asta rāśir mithunaṃ sameti tathaiva vācyo mithuna prayogaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.02b: / asad graha ālokita saṃyute aste sa roṣa iṣṭaiḥ sa vilāsa hāsaḥ//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.03a: / ravi indu śukra avanijaiḥ sva bhāgagair gurau tri koṇa udaya saṃsthite api vā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.03b: / bhavaty apatyaṃ hi vibījinām ime karā hima aṃśor vidṛśām iva aphalāḥ//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.04a: / divākara indvoḥ smaragau kuja arkajau gada pradā puṅgala yoṣitos tadā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.04b: / vyaya svagau mṛtyu karau yutau tathā tad eka dṛṣṭyā maraṇāya kalpitau//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.05a: / divā arka śukrau pitṛ mātṛ saṃjñitau śanaiścara indū niśi tad viparyayāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.05b: / pitṛvya mātṛ svasṛ saṃjñitau ca tāv atha oja yugma ṛkṣa gatau tayoḥ śubhau//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.06a: / abhilaṣadbir udaya ṛkṣam asadbhir maraṇam eti śubha dṛṣṭim ayāte/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.06b: / udaya rāśi sahite ca yame strī vigalita uḍu pati bhū suta dṛṣṭe//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.07a: / pāpa dvaya madhya saṃsthitau lagna indū na ca saumya vīkṣitau/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.07b: / yugapat pṛthag eva vā vaden nārī garbha yutā vipadyate//(vai lī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.08a: / krūre śaśinaś caturthage lagnād vā nidhana āśrite kuje/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.08b: / bandhv antyagayoḥ kṣīṇa indau nidhanāya pūrvavat//(vaitāliyā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.09a: / udaya astagayoḥ kuja arkayor nidhanaṃ śastra kṛtaṃ vadet tathā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.09b: / māsa adhipatau nipīḍite tat kāle sravaṇaṃ samādiśet//(vai lī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.10a: / śaśa aṅka lagna upagataiḥ śubha grahais tri koṇa jāyā artha sukha āspada sthitaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.10b: / tṛtīya lābha ṛkṣa gataiś ca pāpakaiḥ sukhī tu garbho raviṇā nirīkṣitaḥ//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.11a: / oja ṛkṣe puruṣa aṃśakeṣu balibhir lagna arka gurv indubhiḥ puṃ janma pravadet sama aṃśaka gatair yugmeṣu tair yoṣitaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.11b: / gurv arkau viṣame naraṃ śaśi sitau vakraś ca yugme striyaṃ/dvy aṅgastha budha vīkṣaṇāc ca yamalau kurvanti pakṣe svake//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.12a: / vihāya lagnaṃ viṣama ṛkṣa saṃsthaḥ sauro api puṃ janma karo vilagnāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.12b: / prokta grahāṇām avalokya vīryaṃ vācyaḥ prasūtau puruṣo aṅganā vā//(upendravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.13a: / anyonyaṃ yadi paśyataḥ śaśi ravī yady arki saumyāv api vakro vā samagaṃ dina īśam asame candra udayau cet sthitau/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.13b: / yugma oja ṛkṣa gatāv api indu śaśijau bhūmy ātmajena īkṣitau pumbhāve sita lagna śīta kiraṇāḥ ṣaṭ klība yogāḥ smṛtāḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.14a: / yugme candra sitau tathā oja bhavane syur jña āra jīva udayā lagna indū nṛ nirīkṣitau ca samagau yugmeṣu vā prāṇinaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.14b: / kuryur te mithunaṃ graha udaya gatān dvy aṅga aṃśakān paśyati sva aṃśe jñe tritayaṃ jñaga aṃśaka vaśād yugmaṃ tv amiśraiḥ samam//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.15a: / dhanur dharasya antya gate vilagne grahais tad aṃśa upagatair baliṣṭhaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.15b: / jñena arkiṇā vīrya yutena dṛṣṭaiḥ santi prabhūtā api kośa saṃsthāḥ//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.16a: / kalala ghana aṅkura asthi carma aṅgaja cetanatāḥ sita kuja jīva sūrya candra arki budhāḥ parataḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.16b: / udayapa candra sūrya nāthāḥ kramaśo gaditā bhavanti śubha aśubhaṃ ca māsa adhipateḥ sadṛśam//(kuṭaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.17a: / tri koṇage jñe vibalais tathā parair mukha aṅghri hastair dvi guṇas tadā bhavet/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.17b: / avāg gavi indāv aśubhair bha saṃdhigaiḥ śubha īkṣitaś cet kurute giraṃ cirāt//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.18a: / saumya ṛkṣa aṃśe ravija rudhirau cet sa danto atra jātaḥ kubjaḥ sva ṛkṣe śaśini tanuge manda māheya dṛṣṭe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.18b: / paṅgur mīne yama śaśi kujair vīkṣite lagna saṃsthe saṃdhau pāpe śaśini ca jaḍaḥ syān na cet saumya dṛṣṭaḥ//(manda ākrāntā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.19a: / saura śaśa aṅka divā kara dṛṣṭe vāmanako makara antya vilagne/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.19b: / dhī navama udayagaiś ca dṛkāṇaiḥ pāpa yutair abhuja aṅghri śirāḥ syāt//(dodhaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.20a: / ravi śaśi yute siṃhe lagne kuja arki nirīkṣite nayana rahitaḥ saumya asaumyaiḥ sa budbuda locanaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.20b: / vyaya gṛha gataś candro vāmaṃ hinasty aparaṃ ravir na śubha gaditā yogā yāpyā bhavanti śubha īkṣitāḥ//(hariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.21a: / tat kālam indu sahito dvi rasa aṃśako yas tat tulya rāśi sahite purataḥ śaśa aṅke/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.21b: / yāvān udeti dina rātri sa māna bhāgas tāvad gate dina niśoḥ pravadanti janma//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.22a: / udayati mṛdu bha aṃśe saptamasthe ca mande yadi bhavati niṣekaḥ sūtir abda trayeṇa/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_04.22b: / śaśini tu vidhir eṣa dvādaśe abde prakuryān nigaditam iha cintyaṃ sūti kāle api yuktyā//(mālinī)E4
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.01a: / pitur jātaḥ parokṣasya lagnam indāv apaśyati/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.01b: / videśasthasya cara bhe madhyād bhraṣṭe divā kare//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.02a: / udayasthe api vā mande kuje vā astaṃ samāgate
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.02b: / sthite vā antaḥ kṣapā nāthe śaśa aṅka suta śukrayoḥ//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.03a: / śaśa aṅke pāpa lagne vā vṛścika īśa tri bhāgage/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.03b: / śubhaiḥ svāya sthitair jātaḥ sarpas tad veṣṭito api vā//(no metre name)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.04a: / catuṣpāda gate bhānau śeṣair vīrya samanvitaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.04b: / dvi tanusthaiś ca yamalau bhavataḥ kośa veṣṭitau//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.05a: / chāge siṃhe vṛṣe lagne tatsthe saure atha vā kuje/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.05b: / rāśy aṃśa sadṛśe gātre jāyate nāla veṣṭitaḥ//(no metre name)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.06a: / na lagnam induṃ ca gurur nirīkṣate na vā śaśa aṅkaṃ raviṇā samāgatam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.06b: / sa pāpako arkeṇa yuto atha vā śaśī pareṇa jātaṃ pravadanti niścayāt//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.07a: / krūra ṛkṣa gatāv aśobhanau sūryād dyūna nava ātmaja sthitau/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.07b: / baddhas tu pitā videśagaḥ sve vā rāśi vaśād atho pathi//(vaitālīyā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.08a: / pūrṇe śaśini sva rāśige saumye lagna gate śubhe sukhe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.08b: / lagne jalaje astage api vā candro pota gatā prasūyate//(vaitālīyā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.09a: / āpya udayam āpyagaḥ śaśī sampūrṇaḥ samavekṣate atha vā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.09b: / meṣu uraṇa bandhu lagnagaḥ syāt sūtiḥ salile na saṃśayaḥ//(vaitālīyā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.10a: / udaya uḍupayor vyaya sthite guptyāṃ pāpa nirīkṣite yame/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.10b: / ali karki yute vilagnage saure śīta kara īkṣite vaṭe//(vaitālīyā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.11a: / mande abja gate vilagnage budha sūrya indu nirīkṣite kramāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.11b: / krīḍā bhavane sura ālaye sokhara bhūmiṣu ca prasūyate//(vaitālīyā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.12a: / nṛ lagnagaṃ prekṣya kujaḥ śmaśāne ramye sita indū gurur agni hotre/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.12b: / ravir nara indra amarago kuleṣu śilpa ālaye jñaḥ prasavaṃ karoti//(upajātī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.13a: / rāśy aṃśa sa māna go care mārge janma care sthire gṛhe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.13b: / sva ṛkṣa aṃśa gate sva mandire bala yogāt phalam aṃśaka ṛkṣayoḥ//(vaitālīyā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.14a: / āra arkajayos tri koṇage candre aste ca visṛjyate aṃbayā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.14b: / dṛṣṭe amara rāja mantriṇā dīrgha āyuḥ sukha bhāk ca sa smṛtaḥ//(vaitālīyā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.15a: / pāpa īkṣite tuhinagāv udaye kuje aste tyakto vinaśyati kuja arkajayos tathā āye/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.15b: / saumye api paśyati tathā vidha hastam eti saumya itareṣu para hasta gato apy anāyuḥ//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.16a: / pitṛ mātṛ gṛheṣu tad balāt taru śāla ādiṣu nīcagaiḥ śubhaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.16b: / yadi na eka gatais tu vīkṣitau lagna indū vijane prasūyate//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.17a: / manda ṛkṣa aṃśe śaśini hibuke manda dṛṣṭe abjage vā/tad yukte vā tamasi śayane nīca saṃsthaiś ca bhūmau/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.17b: / yad vad rāśir vrajati harijaṃ garbha mokṣas tu tad vat pāpaiś candrāt smara sukha gataiḥ kleśam āhur jananyāḥ//(manda ākrāntā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.18a: / snehaḥ śaśa aṅkād udayāc ca vartir dīpo arka yukta ṛkṣa vaśāc cara ādyaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.18b: / dvāraṃ ca tad vāstuni kendra saṃsthair jñeyaṃ grahaiḥ vīrya samanvitair vā//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.19a: / jīrṇaṃ saṃskṛtam arkaje kṣiti sute dagdhaṃ navaṃ śītagau kāṣṭha āḍhyaṃ na dṛḍhaṃ ravau śaśi sute tan na eka śilpy udbhavam ramyaṃ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.19b: / citra yutaṃ navaṃ ca bhṛguje jīve dṛḍhaṃ mandiraṃ cakrasthaiś ca yathā upadeśa racanāṃ sāmanta pūrvāṃ vadet//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.20a: / meṣa kulīra tulā ali gaṭaiḥ prāg uttarato guru saumya gṛheṣu/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.20b: / paścimataś ca vṛṣeṇa nivāso dakṣiṇa bhāga karau mṛga siṃhau//(dodhaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.21a: / prācy ādi gṛhe kriyā ādayo dvau dvau koṇa gatā dvi mūrtayaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.21b: / śayyāsv api vāstu vad vadet pādaiḥ ṣaṭ tri nava antya saṃsthitaiḥ//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.22a: / candra lagna antara gatair grahaiḥ syur upasūtikāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.22b: / bahir antara cakrād ardhe dṛśya adṛśye anyathā paraiḥ//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.23a: / lagna nava aṃśapa tulya tanuḥ syād vīrya yuta graha tulya vapur vā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.23b: / candra sameta nava aṃśapa varṇaḥ kā ādi vilagna vibhakta bha gātraḥ//(dodhaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.24a: / kaṃ dṛk śrotra nasā kapola hanavo vaktraṃ ca horā ādayas te kaṇṭha aṃsaka bāhu pārśva hṛdaya kroḍāni nābhis tataḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.24b: / bastiḥ śiśna gude tataś ca vṛṣaṇāv ūrū tato jānunī/jaṅgha aṅghri ity ubhayatra vāmam uditair dreṣkāṇa bhāgais tridhā//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.25a: / tasmin pāpa yutaṃ vraṇe śubha yute dṛṣṭe ca lakṣma ādiśet sva ṛkṣa aṃśe sthira saṃyuteṣu sahajaḥ syād anyathā āṅgatukaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.25b: / manda īśma anilajo agni śāstra viṣajo bhaume budhe bhū bhavaḥ sūrye kāṣṭha catuṣ padena himagau śṛṅgy abjajo anyaiḥ śubham//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.26a: / samanupatitā yasmin bhāge trayaḥ sa budhā grahā bhavati niyamāt tasya avāptiḥ śubheṣv aśubheṣu vā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_05.26b: / vraṇa kṛd aśubhaḥ ṣaṣṭhe dehe tanor bha samāśrite tilakam aśakṛd dṛṣṭaḥ saumyair yutaś ca sa lakṣmavān//(hariṇī)E5
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.01a: / saṃdhyāyāṃ hima dīdhiti horā pāpair bha anta gatair nidhanāya/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.01b: / raty ekaṃ śaśi pāpa sametaiḥ kendrair vā sa vināśam upaite//(Vidyunmālā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.02a: / cakrasya pūrva apara bhāgageṣu krūreṣu saumyeṣu ca kīṭa lagne/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.02b: / kṣipraṃ vināśaṃ samupaiti jātaḥ papair vilagna astamaya abhitaś ca//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.03a: / pāpāv udaya asta gatau krūreṇa yutaś ca śaśī/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.03b: / dṛṣṭaś ca śubhair na yadā mṛtyuś ca bhaved acirāt//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.04a: / kṣīṇe himagau vyayagau pāpair udaya aṣṭamagaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.04b: / kendreṣu śubhāś ca na cet kṣipraṃ nidhanaṃ pravadet//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.05a: / krūreṇa saṃyutaḥ śaśī smara antya mṛtyu lagnagaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.05b: / kaṇṭakād bahiḥ śubhair avīkṣitaś ca mṛtyudaḥ//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.06a: / śaśiny ari vināśage nidhanam āśu pāpa īkṣite śubhair atha sama aṣṭaka dalam ataś ca miśraiḥ sthitiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.06b: / asadbhir avalokite balibhir atra māsaṃ śubhe kalatra sahite ca pāpa vijite vilagna adhipe//(pṛthvī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.07a: / lagne kṣīṇe śaśini nidhanaṃ randhra kendreṣu pāpaiḥ pāpa antasthe nidhana hibuka dyūna saṃsthe ca candre//
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.07b: / evaṃ lagne bhavati madana cchidra saṃsthaiś ca pāpair mātrā sārddhaṃ yadi na ca śubhair vīkṣitaḥ śakti bhṛdbhiḥ//(maṃ krā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.08a: / rāśy antage sadbhir avīkṣyamāṇe candre tri koṇa upagataiś ca pāpaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.08b: / prāṇaiḥ prayāty āśu śiśur viyogam aste ca pāpais tuhina aṃśu lagne//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.09a: / aśubha sahite graste candre kuje nidhana āśrite janani sutayor mṛtyur lagne ravau tu sa śastrajaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.09b: / udayati ravau śīta aṃśau vā tri koṇa vināśagair nidhanam aśubhair vīrya upetaiḥ śubhair na yuta īkṣite//(hariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.10a: / asita ravi śaśa aṅka bhūmijair vyaya navama udaya naidhana āśritaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.10b: / bhavati maraṇam āśu dehināṃ yadi balinā guruṇā na vīkṣitāḥ//(aparavakra)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.11a: / suta madana nava antya lagna randhreṣv aśubha yuto maraṇāya śīta raśmiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.11b: / bhṛgu suta śaśi putra deva pūjyair yadi balibhir na yuto avalokito vā//(puṣpita agrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.12a: / yoge sthānaṃ gatavati balinaś candre svaṃ vā tanu gṛham atha vā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_06.12b: / pāpair dṛṣṭe balavati maraṇaṃ varṣasya antaḥ kila muni gaditam//(bhramara vilasitā)E6
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.01a: / maya yavana maṇittha śakti pūrvair divasa kara ādiṣu vatsarāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.01b: / nava tithi viṣaya aśvi bhūta rudra daśa sahitā daśabhiḥ sva tuṅga bheṣu//(puṣpita agrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.02a: / nīce ato ardhaṃ hrasati hi tataś ca antarasthe anupāto horā tv aṃśa pratimam apare rāśi tulyaṃ vadanti/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.02b: / hitvā vakraṃ ripu graha gatair hīyate sva tri bhāgaḥ sūrya ucchinna dyutiṣu ca dalaṃ projihya śukra arka putrau//(meṃ krāṃ)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.03a: / sarva ardha tri caraṇa pañca ṣaṣṭa bhāgāḥ kṣīyante vyaya bhavanād asatsu vāmam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.03b: / satsv ardhaṃ hrasati tathā eka rāśigānām eka aṃśaṃ harati balī tathā āha satyaḥ//(praharṣiṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.04a: / sārdha udita udita nava aṃśa hatāt samastād bhāgo aṣṭa yukta śata saṃkhyam upaito nāśam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.04b: / krūre vilagna sahite vidhinā tv anena saumya īkṣite dalam ataḥ pralayaṃ prayāti//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.05a: / samā ṣaṣṭir dvighnā manuja kariṇāṃ pañca ca niśā hayānāṃ dvātriṃśat khara karabhayoḥ pañcaka kṛtiḥ
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.05b: / virūpā sā apy āyur vṛṣa mahiṣayor dvādaśa śunāṃ smṛtaṃ chāga ādīnāṃ daśaka sahitāḥ ṣaṭ ca parama//(śikhariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.06a: / animiṣa parama aṃśake vilagne śaśi tanaye gavi pañca varga lipte/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.06b: / bhavati hi parama āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi sakalaḥ sahitāḥ sva tuṅga bheṣu//(puṣpitāgrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.07a: / āyur dāyaṃ viṣṇu gupto api ca evaṃ deva svāmī siddhasenaś ca cakre/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.07b: / doṣaś ca eṣāṃ jāyate aṣṭāv ariṣṭaṃ hitvā na āyur viṃśateḥ syād adhastāt//(śālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.08a: / yasmin yoge pūrṇam āyuḥ pradiṣṭaṃ tasmin proktaṃ cakra vartitvam anyaiḥ
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.08b: / pratyakṣo ayaṃ doṣaḥ paro api jīvaty āyuḥ pūrṇam arthair vinā api//(śālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.09a: / sva matena kila āha jīva śarmā graha dāyaṃ parama āyusaḥ svara aṃśam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.09b: / graha bhukta nava aṃśa rāśi tulyaṃ bahu sāmyaṃ samupaiti satya vākyam//(upacchandasikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.10a: / satya ukte graham iṣṭaṃ liptī kṛtvā śata dvayena āptam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.10b: / maṇḍala bhāga viśuddhe abdāḥ syuḥ śeṣāt tu māsa ādyāḥ//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.11a: / sva tuṅga vakra upagatais tri saṃguṇaṃ dvir uttama sva aṃśaka bha tri bhhāgagaiḥ//
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.11b: / iyān viśeṣas tu bhadatta bhāṣite sa mānam anyat prathame apy udīritam//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.12a: / kiṃ tv atra bha aṃśa pratimaṃ dadāti vīrya anvitā rāśi samaṃ ca horā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.12b: / krūra udaye ca upacayaḥ sa na atra kāryaṃ ca na abdaiḥ prathama upadiṣṭaiḥ//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.13a: / satya upadeśo varam atra kintu kurvanty ayogyaṃ bahu vargaṇābhiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.13b: / ācāryakatvaṃ ca bahu ghnatāyām ekaṃ tu yad bhūri tad eva kāryam//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.14a: / guru śaśi sahite kulīra lagne śaśi tanaye bhṛguje ca kendra yāte/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_07.14b: / bhava ripu sahaja upagaiś ca śeṣair amitam iha āyur anukramād vinā syāt//(puṣpitāgrā)E7
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.01a: / udaya ravi śaśa aṅka prāṇi kendra ādi saṃsthāḥ/prathama vayasi madhye antye ca dadyuḥ phalāni/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.01b: / na hi na phala vipākaḥ kendra saṃstha ādya bhāve bhavati hi phala paktiḥ pūrvam āpoklime api//(malīnī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.02a: / āyuḥ kṛtaṃ yena hi yat tad eva kalpyā daśa sā prabalasya pūrvām/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.02b: / sāmye bahūnāṃ bahu varṣadasya teṣāṃ ca sāmye prathama uditasya//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.03a: / eka ṛkṣago ardham apahṛtya dadāti tu svaṃ try aṃśaṃ tri koṇa gṛhagaḥ smaragaḥ svara aṃśam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.03b: / pādaṃ phalasya caturasra gataḥ sa horas tv evaṃ paraspara gatāḥ paripācayanti//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.04a: / sthāna anyathā etāni sa varṇayitvā sarvāṇy adhaś cheda vivarjitāni/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.04b: / daśa abda piṇḍe guṇakā yathā aṃśaṃ chedas tad aikyena daśa aprabhedaḥ//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.05a: / samyag balinaḥ sva tuṅga bhāge sampūrṇā bala varjitasya riktā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.05b: / nīca aṃśa gatasya śatru bhāge jñeya aniṣṭa phalā daśā prasūtau//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.06a: / bhraṣṭasya tuṅgād avarohi saṃjñā madhyā bhavet sā suhṛd ucca bhāge/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.06b: / arohiṇī nimna paricyutasya nīca ari bha aṃśeṣv adhamā bhave sā//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.07a: / nīca ari bha aṃśe samavasthitasya śaste gṛhe gṛhe miśra phalā pradiṣṭā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.07b: / saṃjñā anurūpāṇi phalāny atha eṣāṃ daśāsu vakṣyāmi yathā upayogam//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.08a: / ubhaye adhama madhya pūjitā dreṣkāṇaiś cara bheṣu ca utkramāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.08b: / aśubha iṣṭa samāḥ sthire kramād dhorāyāḥ parikalpitā daśā//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.09a: / ekaṃ dvau nava viṃśatir dhṛti kṛtī pañcāśad eṣāṃ kramāc candra āra induja śukra jīva dinakrid daivā kariṇāṃ samāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.09b: / svaiḥ svaiḥ puṣṭa phalāni sarga janitaiḥ paktir daśāyāḥ kramād ante lagna daśā śubha iti yavanā na icchanti ke cit tathā//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.10a: / pāka svāmini lagnage suhṛdi vā varge asya saumye api vā prārabdhā śubhadā daśā tridaśa ṣaḍ lābheṣu vā pākape/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.10b: / mitra ucca upacayas tri koṇa madane pāka īśvarasya sthitaś candraḥ sat phala bodhanāni kurute pāpāni ca ato anyathā//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.11a: / prārabdhā himagau daśā sva gṛhage māna artha saukhya āvahā kauje dūṣayati striyaṃ budha gṛhe vidyā suhṛd vittadā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.11b: / durga araṇya patha ālaye kṛṣi karī siṃhe sita ṛkṣe annadā kustrīdā mṛga kumbhayor guru gṛhe māna artha saukhya āvahā//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.12a: / sauryāṃ svan nakha danta carma kanaka kraurya adhva bhūpa āhavais takṣṇyaṃ dairyam ajasram udyama ratiḥ khyātiḥ pratāpa unnatiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.12b: / bhārya putra dhana ari śastra hutabhug bhūpa udbhavā vyāpada styāgī pāpa ratiḥ sva bhṛtya kalaho hṛt kroḍa pīḍā āmayāḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.13a: / indoḥ prāpya daśāṃ phalāni labhate mantra dvijāty udbhavani īkṣu kṣīra vikāra vastra kusuma krīḍā tila anna śramaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.13b: / nidrā alasya mṛdu dvija amara ratiḥ strī janma medhāvitā kīrty artha upacakṣayau ca balibhir vairaṃ sva pakṣeṇa ca//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.14a: / bhaumasya ari vimarda bhūpa sahaja kṣity āvika ajair dhanaṃ pradveṣaḥ suta mitra dāra sahajair vidvad guru dveṣṭṛtā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.14b: / tṛṣṇa asṛg jvara pitta bhaṅga janitā rogāḥ para strī kṛtāḥ prītiḥ pāpa ratair adharma niratiḥ pāruṣya taikṣṇyāni ca//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.15a: / baudhyāṃ dautya suhṛd guru dvija dhanaṃ vidvat praśaṃsā yaśo yukti dravya suvarṇa vesara mahī saubhāgya saukhya āptayaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.15b: / hāsya upāsana kauśalaṃ mati cayo dharma kriyā siddhayaḥ pāruṣyaṃ śrama bandha mānasa śucaḥ pīḍā ca dhātu trayāt//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.16a: / jaivyāṃ māna guṇa udayo mati cayaḥ kāntiḥ pratāpa unnatir māhātmya udyama mantra nīti nṛ pati svādhyāya mantrair dhanam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.16b: / hema aśva ātmaja kuñjara ambara cayaḥ prītiś ca sad bhūmipaiḥ/sūkṣmya ūha gahana āśramaḥ śravaṇa rug vairaṃ vidharma āśritaiḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.17a: / śaukyāṃ gīta ratiḥ pramoda surabhi dravya anna pāna ambara strī ratna dyuti manmatha upakaraṇa jñāna iṣṭa mitra āgamāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.17b: / kauśalyaṃ kraya vikraye kṛṣi nidhi prāptir dhanasya āgamo/vṛnda ūrvī īśa niṣāda dharma rahitair vairaṃ śucaḥ snehataḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.18a: / saurīṃ prāpya khara uṣṭra pakṣi mahiṣī vṛddha aṅganā avāptayaḥ/śreṇī grāma puradhi kāra janitā pūjā kudhānya āgamaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.18b: / śleṣma īrṣya anila kopa moha malina vyāpatti tandra āśramān/bhṛtya apatya kalatra bhartsanam api prāpnoti ca vyaṅgayatām//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.19a: / daśāsu śastāsu śubhāni kurvanty aniṣṭa saṃjñā sva śubhāni ca evam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.19b: / miśrāsu niśrāṇi daśā phalāni horā phalaṃ lagna pateḥ sa mānam//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.20a: / saṃjñā adhyāye yasya yad ravya muktaṃ karma āajīvo yaś ca yasya upadiṣṭaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.20b: / bhāva sthāna āloka yoga udbhavaṃ ca tat tat sarvaṃ tasya yojyaṃ daśāyām//(śālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.21a: / chāyāṃ mahā bhūta kṛtāṃ ca sarve abhivyañjayanti sva daśām avāpya/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.21b: / kv ambv agni vāyv ambarajān guṇāṃś ca nāsā āsya dṛk tvak chravaṇa anumeyāt//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.22a: / śubha phalada daśāyā tādṛg eva antara ātmā/bahu janayati puṃsāṃ sakhyam artha āgamaṃ ca
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.22b: / kathita phala vipākais tarkayed vartamānāṃ/pariṇamati phala āptiḥ svapna cintā sva vīrjaiḥ//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.23a: / eka grahasya sadṛśe phalayor virodhe/nāśaṃ vaded yad adhikaṃ paripacyate tat/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_08.23b: / na anyo grahaḥ sadṛśam anya phalaṃ hinasti/svāṃ svāṃ daśām upagatāḥ sa phala pradā syuḥ//(vasantatilakā)E8
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.01a: / svād arkaḥ prathama āya bandhu nidhana dvy ājñā tapo dyūnago vakrāt svād iva tadvad eva ravijāc chukrāt smara antya ariṣu/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.01b: / jīvād dharma suta āya śatruṣu daśa try āya arigaḥ śītagor eṣu eva antya tapaḥ suteṣu ca budhāl lagnāt sa bandhv antyagaḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.02a: / lagnāt ṣaṭ tri daśa āyagaḥ sa dhana dhī dharmeṣu cārāc chaśī svāt sa asta ādiṣu sa aṣṭa saptasu raveḥ ṣaṭ try āya dhīstho yamāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.02b: / dhī try āya aṣṭama kaṇṭakeṣu śaśijāj jīvād vyaya āya aṣṭagaḥ kendrasthaś ca sitāt tu dharma sukha dhī try āya āspada anaṅgagaḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.03a: / vakras tu upacayeṣv ināt sa tanayeṣv ādya adhikeṣu udayāc/candrād dig viphaleṣu kendra nidhana prāpty arthagaḥ svāc chubhaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.03b: / dharma āya aṣṭama kendrago arka tanayāj jñāt ṣaṭ tri dhī lābhagaḥ/śukrāt ṣaḍ vyaya lābha mṛtyuṣu guroḥ karmāny alābha ariṣu//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.04a: / dvy ādya āya aṣṭa tapaḥ sukheṣu bhṛgujāt sa try ātmajeṣv indujaḥ sa ājñā asteṣu yama arayor vyaya ripu prāpty aṣṭago vāk pateḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.04b: / dharma āya ari suta vyayeṣu savituḥ svāt sa ādya karma trigaḥ ṣaṭ sva āya aṣṭa sukha āspadeṣu himagoḥ sa ādyeṣu lagnāc chubhaḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.05a: / dik sva ādya aṣṭama dāya bandhuṣu kujāt svāt trikeṣv aṅgirāḥ sūryāt satri naveṣu dhī sva nava dig lābha arigo bhārgavāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.05b: / jāyā āya ratha nava ātmajeṣu himagor mandāt tri ṣaḍ dhī vyaye dig dhī ṣaṭ sva sukha āya pūrva navago jñāt sa smaraś ca udayāt//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.06a: / lagnād ā suta lābha randhra navagaḥ sa antyaḥ śaśa aṅkāt sitaḥ svāt sa ājñeṣu sukha tri dhī nava daśa cchidra āptigaḥ sūryajāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.06b: / randhra āya vyago raver nava daśa prāpty aṣṭa dhīstho guror jñād dhī try āya nava arigas tri nava ṣaṭ putra āyasa antyaḥ kujāt//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.07a: / manda svāt tri suta āya śatruṣu śubhaḥ sa ājñā antyago bhūmijāt kendra āya aṣṭa dhaneṣv inād upacayeṣv ādye sukhe ca udayāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.07b: / dharma āya ari daśa antya mṛtyuṣu budhāc candrāt trī ṣaḍ lābhagaḥ ṣaṣṭha āya antya gataḥ sitās sura guroḥ prāpty antya dhī śatruṣu//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.08a: / iti nigaditam iṣṭaṃ na iṣṭam anyad viśeṣād adhika phala vipākaṃ janma bhāt tatra dadyuḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_09.08b: / upacaya gṛha mitra sva uccagaiḥ puṣṭam iṣṭaṃ av apacaya gṛha nīca āra atigair na iṣṭa sampat//(mālinī)E9
GS41brhajj_u:bj_10.01a: / artha āptiḥ pitṛ pitṛ patni śatru mitra bhrātṛ strī mṛtaka janād divā kara ādyaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_10.01b: / horā indvor daśama gatair vikalpanīyā bha indv arka āspada patiga aṃśa nātha vṛttyā//(praharṣiṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_10.02a: / arka aṃśe tṛṇa kanaka arṇa bheṣaja ādyaiś candra aṃśe kṛṣi jalaja aṅganā āśrayāc ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_10.02b: / dhātv agni praharaṇa sāhasaiḥ kuja aṃśe saumya aṃśe lipi gaṇitā ādi kāvya śilpaiḥ//(praharṣiṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_10.03a: / jīva aṃśe dvija vibudha ākara ādi dharmaiḥ kāvya aṃśe maṇi rajata ādi go mahiṣyaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_10.03b: / saura aṃśe śrama vadha bhāra nīca śilpaiḥ karma īśa adhyuṣita nava aṃśa karma siddhiḥ//(praharṣiṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_10.04a: / mitra ari sva gṛha gatair grahais tato arthaṃ tuṅgasthe balini ca bhās kare sva vīryāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_10.04b: / āyasthair udaya dhana āśritaiś ca saumyaiḥ saṃcintyaṃ bala sahitair anekadhā svam//(praharṣiṇī)E10
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.01a: / prāhur yavanāḥ sva tuṅgagaiḥ krūraiḥ krūra matir mahīpatiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.01b: / krūrais tu na jīva śarmaṇaḥ pakṣe kṣity adhipaḥ prajāyate//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.02a: / vakra arkaja arka gurubhiḥ sakalais tribhiś ca sva ucceṣu ṣoḍaśa nṛpāḥ kathita ekalagne/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.02b: / dvy eka āśriteṣu ca tathā ekatame vilagne sva kṣetrage śaśini ṣoḍaśa bhūmipāḥ syuḥ//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.03a: / varga uttama gate lagne candre vā candra varjitaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.03b: / catura ādyair grahair dṛṣṭe nṛpā dvāviṃśatiḥ smṛtāḥ//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.04a: / yame kumbhe arke aje gavi śaśini tair eva tanugair nṛ yuktiṃ saha alisthaiḥ śaśija guru vakrair nṛ patayaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.04b: / yama indū tuṅge aṅge savitṛ śaśijau ṣaṣṭha bhavane tulā aja indu kṣetraiḥ sa sita kuja jīvaiś ca narapau//(śikhariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.05a: / kuje tuṅge arka indvor dhanuṣi yama lagne ca kupatiḥ patir bhūmeś ca anyaḥ kṣiti suta vilagne sa śaśini/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.05b: / sa candre saure aste sura pati gurau cāpa dharage sva tuṅgasthe bhānāv udayam upayāte kṣiti patiḥ//(śikhariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.06a: / vṛṣe sa indau lagne savitṛ guru tīkṣṇa aṃśu tanayaiḥ suhṛj jāyā khasthair bhavati niyamān mānava patiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.06b: / mṛge mande lagne sahaja ripu dharma vyaya gataiḥ śaśa aṅka ādyaiḥ khyātaḥ pṛthu guṇa yaśāḥ puṅgala patiḥ//(śikhariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.07a: / haye sa indau jīve mṛga mukha gate bhūmi tanaye sva tuṅgasthau lagne bhṛguja śaśijāv atra nṛ patī/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.07b: / sutasthau vakra arkī guru śaśi sitāś ca api hibuke budhe kanyā lagne bhavati hi nṛpo anyo api guṇavān//(śikhariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.08a: / jhaṣe sa indau lagne ghaṭa mṛga mṛga indreṣu sahitair yama āra arkair yo abhūt sa khalu manujaḥ śāsti vasudhām/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.08b: / aje sāre mūrtau śaśi gṛha gate ca amara gurau/surejye vā lagne dharaṇi patir anyo api guṇavān//(śikhariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.09a: / karkiṇi lagne tatsthe jīve candra sita jñair āya prāptaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.09b: / meṣa gate arke jātaṃ vidyād vikrama yuktaṃ pṛthvī nātham//(vidyun mālā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.10a: / mṛga mukhe arka tanayas tanu saṃsthaḥ kriya kulīra harayo adhipa yuktāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.10b: / mithuna tauli sahitau budha śukrau yadi tadā pṛthu yaśāḥ pṛthivī īśaḥ//(drutavilambitā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.11a: / sva ucca saṃsthe budhe lagne bhṛgau meṣu uraṇa āśrite/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.11b: / sa jīve aste niśā nāthe rājā manda ārayoḥ sute//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.12a: / api khala kula jātā mānavā rājya bhājaḥ kim uta nṛpa kula utthāḥ prokta bhū pāla yogaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.12b: / nṛ pati kula samutthāḥ pārthivā vakṣyamāṇair bhavati nṛ pati tulyas teṣv abhū pāla putraḥ//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.13a: / ucca sva tri koṇagair balasthais try ādyair bhū pati vaṃśajā nara indrāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.13b: / pañca ādibhir anya vaṃśa jātā hīnair vitta yutā na bhūmi pālāḥ//(aupacchandasika)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.14a: / lekhāsthe arke aja indau lagne bhaume sva ucce kumbhe mande/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.14b: / cāpa prāpte jīve rājñaḥ putraṃ vindyāt pṛthvī nātham//(vidyun mālā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.15a: / sva ṛkṣe śukre pātālasthe dharma sthānaṃ prāpte candre/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.15b: / duścikya aṅga prāpti prāptaiḥ śeṣair jātaḥ svāmī bhūmeḥ//(vidyunmala)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.16a: / saumye vīrya yute tanu yukte vīrya āḍhye ca śubhe śubha yāte/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.16b: / dharma artha upacayeṣv avaśeṣair dharma ātmā nṛpajaḥ pṛthivī īśaḥ//(navamālikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.17a: / vṛṣa udaye mūrti dhana ari lābhagaiḥ śaśa aṅka jīva arka suta aparair nṛpaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.17b: / sukhe gurau khe śaśi tīkṣṇa dīdhitī yama udaye lābha gatair nṛpo aparaiḥ//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.18a: / meṣu uraṇāya tanugāḥ śaśi manda jīvā jña ārau dhane sita ravī hibuke nara indram/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.18b: / vakra asitau śaśi surejya sita arka saumyā horā sukha asta śubha kha āpti gatāḥ prajā īśam//(vasnatatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.19a: / karma lagna yuta pāka daśāyāṃ rājya labdhir atha vā prabalasya/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.19b: / śatru nīca gṛha yāta daśāyāṃ cchidra saṃśraya daśā parikalpyā//(svagatā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.20a: / guru sita budha lagne saptamasthe arka putre viyati divasa nāthe bhogināṃ janma vindyāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_11.20b: / śubha bala yuta kendraiḥ krūra saṃsthaiś ca pāpair vrajati śabara dasyu svāmitām artha bhāk ca//(mālinī)E11
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.01a: / nava dig vasavas trika agni vedair guṇitā dvi tri catur vikalpajāḥ syuḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.01b: / yavanais tri guṇā hi ṣaṭ śatī sā kathitā vistarato agra tat samāḥ syuḥ//(aupacchandasika)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.02a: / rajjur muśalaṃ nalaś cara ādyaiḥ satyaś ca āśrayaja āñja gāda yogān/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.02b: / kendraiḥ sad asad yutair dala ākhyau srak sarpau kathitau parāśareṇa//(aupacchandasika)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.03a: / yogā vrajanty āśrayajāḥ samatvaṃ yava abja vajra aṇḍaja golaka ādyaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.03b: / kendra upagaiḥ prokta phalau dala ākhyāv ity āhur anye na pṛthak phalau tau//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.04a: / āsanna kendra bhavana dvayagair gadā ākhyas tanu astageṣu śakaṭaṃ vihagaḥ kha bandhvoḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.04b: / śṛṅgāṭakaṃ navama pañcama lagna saṃsthair lagna anyagair halam iti pravadanti taj jñāḥ//(vasantatilakā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.05a: / śakaṭa aṇḍaja vac chubha aśubair vajraṃ tad viparītagair yavaḥ//
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.05b: / kamalaṃ tu vimiśra saṃsthitair vā api tad yadi kendra bāhyataḥ//(vaitālīyā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.06a: / pūrva śāstra anusāreṇa mayā vajra ādayaḥ kṛtāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.06b: / cauturthe bhavane sūryāj jña sitau bhavataḥ katham//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.07a: / kaṇṭaka ādi pravṛttais tu catur gṛha gatair grahaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.07b: / yūpeṣu śakti daṇḍa ākhyā horā ādyaiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ kramāt//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.08a: / nau kūṭa cchatra cāpāni tadvat sapta ṛkṣa saṃsthitaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.08b: / ardha candras tu nāv ādyaiḥ proktas tv anya ṛkṣa saṃsthitaiḥ//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.09a: / eka antara gatair arthāt samudraḥ ṣaḍ gṛha āśritaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.09b: / vilagna ādi sthitaiś cakram ity ākṛtija saṃgrahaḥ//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.10a: / saṃkhyā yogāḥ syuḥ sapta sapta ṛkṣa saṃsthir eka apāyād vallakī dāminī ca
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.10b: / pāśaḥ kedāraḥ śūla yogo yugaṃ ca golaś ca anyān pūrvam uktān vihāya//(śālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.11a: / īrṣyur videśa nirato adhva ruciś ca rajjvāṃ mānī dhanī ca muśale bahu kṛtya saktaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.11b: / vyaṅgaḥ sthira āḍhya nipuṇo nalajaḥ srag uttho bhogā anvito bhuja gajo bahu duḥkha bhāk syāt//(vaṃ ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.12a: / āśraya uktās tu viphalā bhavanty anyair vimiśritāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.12b: / miśrā yais te phalaṃ dadyur amiśrāḥ sva phala pradāḥ//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.13a: / yajv artha bhāk satatam artha rucir gadāyāṃ tad vṛtti bhuk śakaṭajaḥ sarujaḥ kudāraḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.13b: / dūto aṭanaḥ kalaha kṛd vihage pradiṣṭaḥ śṛṅgāṭake cira sukhī kṛṣikṛd dhalākṣye//(va ti )
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.14a: / vajre antya pūrva sukhinaḥ subhago atiśūro vīrya anvito apy atha yave sukhito vayo antaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.14b: / vikhyāta kīrty amita saukhya guṇaś ca padme vāpyāṃ tanu sthira sukho nidhi kṛn na dātā//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.15a: / tyāga ātmavān kratu varair yajate ca yūpe hiṃsro atha gupty adhikṛtaḥ śarakṛc chara ākhye/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.15b: / nīco alasaḥ sukha dhanair viyutaś ca śaktau daṇḍe priyair virahitaḥ puruṣa antya vṛttiḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.16a: / kīrtyā yutaś cala sukhaḥ kṛpaṇaś ca naujaḥ kūṭe anṛta plavana bandhanapaś ca jātaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.16b: / chatra udbhavaḥ sva jana saukhya karo antya saukhyaḥ śūraś ca kārmuka bhavaḥ prathama antya saukhyaḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.17a: / ardha indujaḥ subhaga kānta vapuḥ pradhānas toya ālaye nara pati pratimas tu bhogī/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.17b: / cakre nara indra mukuṭa dyuti rañjita aṅghrir vīṇā udbhavaś ca nipuṇaḥ priya gīta nṛtyaḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.18a: / dātā anya kārya nirataḥ paśupaś ca dāmni pāśe dhana arjana viśīla sa bhṛtya bandhuḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.18b: / kedārajaḥ kṛṣi karaḥ subahu upayoṣyaḥ śūraḥ kṣato dhana rucir vidhanaś ca śūle//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.19a: / dhana virahitaḥ pākhaṇḍī vā yuge tv atha golake vidhana malino jñāna upetaḥ kuśilpyalaso aṭanaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_12.19b: / iti nigaditā yogāḥ sārddhaṃ phalair iha nābhasā niyata phaladāś cintyā hy ete samasta daśāsv api//(hariṇī)E12
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.01a: / adhama sama variṣṭhāny arka kendra ādi saṃsthe śaśini vinaya vitta jñāna dhī naipuṇāni/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.01b: / ahani niśi ca candre sve adhimitra aṃśake vā sura guru sita dṛṣṭe vittavān syāt sukhī ca//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.02a: / saumyaiḥ smara ari nidhaneṣv adhiyoga indos tasmiṃś camūpa saciva kṣiti pāla janma/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.02b: / sampanna saukhya vibhavā hata śatravaś ca dīrgha āyuṣo vigata roga bhayāś ca jātāḥ//(va ti )
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.03a: / hitvā arkaṃ sunaphā anaphā durudhurāḥ sva antya ubhayasthair grahaiḥ śīta aṃśoḥ kathito anyathā tu bahubhiḥ kemadrumo anyais tv asau/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.03b: / kendre śīta kare atha vā graha yute kemadrumo na iṣyate ke cit kendra nava aṃśakeṣu ca vadanty uktiḥ prasiddhā na te//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.04a: / triṃśat sa rūpāḥ sunaphā anaphā ākhyāḥ ṣaṣṭitrayaṃ daurudhure prabhedāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.04b: / icchā vikalpaiḥ kramaśo abhinīya nīte nivṛttiḥ punar anya nītiḥ//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.05a: / svayam adhigata vittaḥ pārthivas tat samo vā bhavati hi sunaphāyāṃ dhī dhana khyātimāṃś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.05b: / prabhura gada śarīraḥ śīlavān khyāta kīrtir viṣaya sukha suveṣo nirvṛtaś ca anaphāyām//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.06a: / utpanna bhoga sukha bhug dhana vāhana āḍhyas tyāga anvito durudhurā prabhavaḥ subhṛtyaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.06b: / kemadrume malina duḥkhita nīca niḥsvāḥ preṣyāḥ khalāś ca nṛpater api vaṃśa jātāḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.07a: / utsāha śaurya dhana sāhasa vān mahījaḥ saumyaḥ paṭuḥ suvacano nipuṇaḥ kalāsu/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.07b: / jīvo artha dharma sukha bhāṅ nṛpa pūjitaś ca kāmī bhṛgur bahu dhano viṣaya upabhoktā//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.08a: / para vibhava paricchada upabhoktā ravi tanayo bahu kāryakṛd gaṇeśaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.08b: / aśubha kṛd uḍupo ahni dṛśya mūrtir galita tanuś ca śubho anyathā anyad ūhyam//(puṣpitāgrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.09a: / lagnād atīva vasumān vasumāñ chaśa aṅkāt saumya grahair upacaya upagataiḥ samastaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_13.09b: / dvābhyāṃ samo alpa vasumāṃś ca tad ūnatāyām anyeṣv asatsv api phaleṣv idam utkaṭena//(va ti)E13
GS41brhajj_u:bj_14.01a: / tigma aṃśur janayaty uṣeśa sahito yantra aśma kāraṃ naraṃ bhaumena agharataṃ budhena nipuṇaṃ dhī kīrti saukhya anvitam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_14.01b: / krūraṃ vāk patinā anya kārya nirataṃ śukreṇa raṅga āyudhair labdhasvaṃ ravijena dhātu kuśalaṃ bha aṇḍa prakāreṣu vā//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_14.02a: / kūṭa stry āsava kumbha paṇyam aśivaṃ mātuḥ sa vakraḥ śaśī/sa jñaḥ praśrita vākyam artha nipuṇaṃ saubhāgya kīrtyā anvitam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_14.02b: / vikrāntaṃ kula mukhyam asthira matiṃ vitta īśvaraṃ sa aṅgirā/vastrāṇāṃ sa sitaḥ kriyā ādi kuśalaṃ sa arkiḥ punarbhū sutam//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_14.03a: / mūla ādi sneha kūṭair vyavaharati vaṇig bāhu yoddhā sa saumye/puryadhyakṣaḥ sa jīve bhavati nara patiḥ prāpta vitto dvijo vā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_14.03b: / gopo mallo atha dakṣaḥ para yuvati rato dyūta kṛt sāsurejye duḥkha ārto asatya saṃdhaḥ sa savitṛ tanaye bhūmije ninditaś ca//(śa vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_14.04a: / saumye raṅga caro bṛhaspati yute gīta priyo nṛtyavid vāgmī bhū gaṇapaḥ sitena mṛdunā māyā paṭur laṅghakaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_14.04b: / sad vidyo dhana dāravān bahu guṇaḥ śukreṇa yukte gurau jñeyaḥ śmaśru karo asitena ghaṭakṛj jāto anna kāro api vā//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_14.05a: / asita sita samāgame alpa cakṣur yuvati samāśraya sampravṛddha vittaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_14.05b: / bhavati ca lipi pustaka citra vettā kathita phalaiḥ parato vikalpanīyāḥ//(puṣpitāgrā)E14
GS41brhajj_u:bj_15.01a: / ekasthaiś catura ādibhir bala yutair jātāḥ pṛthag vīryagaiḥ/śākyā jīvika bhikṣu vṛddha carakā nirgrantha vanya āśanāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_15.01b: / māheya jña guru kṣapā kara sita prābhākarīnaiḥ kramāt/pravrajyā balibhiḥ samā parajitais tat svāmibhiḥ pracyutiḥ//(no name)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_15.02a: / ravi kupta karair adīkṣitā balibhis tad gata bhaktayo narāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_15.02b: / abhiyācita mātra dīkṣitā nihatair anya nirīkṣitair api//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_15.03a: / janma īśo anyair yady adṛṣṭo arka putraṃ paśyaty ārkir janmapaṃ vā bala ūnam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_15.03b: / dīkṣāṃ prāpnoty ārki dṛk kāṇa saṃsthe bhauma ārky aṃśe saura dṛṣṭe ca candre//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_15.04a: / sura guru śaśi horā sva ārke dṛṣṭāsu dharme gurur atha nṛpatīnāṃ yogajas tīrtha kṛt syāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_15.04b: / navama bhavana saṃsthe mandage anyair dṛṣṭe bhavati narapa yoge dīkṣitaḥ pārthiva indraḥ//(mālinī)E15
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.01a: / priya bhūṣaṇaḥ surūpaḥ subhago dakṣo aśvinīṣu matimāṃś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.01b: / kṛta niścaya satya arug dakṣaḥ sukhitaś ca bharaṇīṣu//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.02a: / bahu bhuk para dāra ratas tejasvī kṛttikāsu vikhyātaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.02b: / rohiṇyāṃ satya śuciḥ priyaṃvadaḥ sthira matiḥ surūpaś ca//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.03a: / capalaś caturo bhīruḥ paṭur utsāhī dhanī mṛge bhogī/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.03b: / śaṭha garvitaḥ kṛtaghno hiṃsraḥ pāpaś ca raudra ṛkṣe//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.04a: / dāntaḥ sukhī suśīlo durmedhā roga bhāk pipāsuś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.04b: / alpena ca saṃtuṣṭaḥ punarvasau jāyate manujaḥ/(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.05a: / śānta ātmā subhagaḥ paṇḍito dhanī dharma saṃsṛtaḥ puṣye/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.05b: / śaṭhaḥ sarva bhakṣa pāpaḥ kṛtaghna dhūrtaś ca bhaujaṅge//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.06a: / bahu bhṛtya dhano bhogī sura pitṛ bhakto mahā udyamaḥ pitrye/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.06b: / priya vāg dātā dyutimān aṭano nṛpa sevako bhāgye//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.07a: / subhago vidyā āpta dhano bhogī sukhabhāk dvitīya phālgunyām/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.07b: / utsāhī dhṛṣṭaḥ pānapo ghṛṇī taskaro haste//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.08a: / citra ambara mālya dharaḥ sulocana aṅgaś ca bhavati citrāyām/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.08b: / dānto vaṇik kṛpāluḥ priya vāg dharma āśritaḥ svātau//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.09a: / īrṣyur lubdho dyutimān vacana paṭuḥ kalaha kṛd viśākhāsu/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.09b: / āḍhyo videśa vāsī kṣudhālur aṭano anurādhāsu//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.10a: / jyeṣṭhāsu na bahu mitraḥ saṃtuṣṭo dharma kṛt pracura kopaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.10b: / mūle mānī dhanavān sukhī na hiṃsraḥ sthiro bhogī//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.11a: / iṣṭa ānanda kalatro mānī dṛḍha sauhṛdaś ca jala daive/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.11b: / vaiśve vinīta dhārmika bahu mitra kṛtajña subhagaś ca//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.12a: / śrīmāñ chravaṇe śrutavān udāra dāro dhana anvitaḥ khyātaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.12b: / dātā āḍhyaḥ śūro gīta priyo dhaniṣṭhāsu dhana lubdhaḥ//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.13a: / sphuṭa vāg vyasanī ripuhā sāhasikaḥ śatabhiṣaji durgrāhyaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.13b: / bhādrapadāsu dvi ganaḥ strī jita dhanī paṭur adātā ca//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.14a: / vaktā sukhī prajāvān jita śatrur dhārmiko dvitīyāsu/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_16.14b: / sampūrṇa aṅgaḥ subhagaḥ śūraḥ śucir arthavān pauṣṇe//(āryā)E16
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.01a: / vṛtta ātāmra dṛg uṣṇa śāka laghu bhuk kṣipra prasādo aṭanaḥ/kāmī durbala jānur asthira dhanaḥ śūro aṅganā vallabhaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.01b: / sevājñaḥ kanakhī vraṇa aṅkita śirā mānī saha uttha agrajaḥ/śaktyā pāṇi tale aṅkito aticapalas toye atibhīruḥ kriye//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.02a: / kāntaḥ khela gatiḥ pṛthu ūru vadanaḥ pṛṣṭha āsya pārśva aṅkitas tyāgī kleśa sahaḥ prabhuḥ kakudavān kanyā prajaḥ śleṣmalaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.02b: / pūrvair bandhu dhana ātmajair virahitaḥ saubhāgya yuktaḥ kṣamī dīpta agniḥ pramadā priyaḥ sthira suhṛn madhya antya saukhyo gavi//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.03a: / strī lolaḥ suratā upacāra kuśalas tāmra īkṣaṇaḥ śāstravid dūtaḥ kuñcita mūrdhajaḥ paṭu matir hāsya iṅgita dyūtavit/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.03b: / cārv aṅgaḥ priya vāk prabha kṣaṇa rucir gīta priyo nṛtyavit klībair yāti ratiṃ samunnata nasaś candre tṛtīya ṛkṣage//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.04a: / āvakra drutagaḥ samunnata kaṭiḥ strī nirjjitaḥ sat suhṛd daivajñaḥ pracura ālaya kṣaya dhanaiḥ saṃyujyate candravat//
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.04b: / hrasvaḥ pīna galaḥ sameti ca vaṃśa sāmnā suhṛd vatsalas/toya udyāna rataḥ sva veśma sahite jātaḥ śaśa aṅke naraḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.05a: / tīkṣṇaḥ sthūla hanur viśāla vadanaḥ piṅga īkṣaṇo alpa ātmajaḥ/strī dveṣī priya māṃsa kānana nagaḥ kupyaty akārye ciram/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.05b: / kṣut tṛṇa udara danta mānasa rujā sampīḍitas tyāgavān/vikrāntaḥ sthira dhīḥ sugarvita manā mātur vidheyo arka bhe//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.06a: / vrīḍā manthara cāru vīkṣaṇa gatiḥ srasta aṃsa bāhuḥ sukhī/ślakṣṇaḥ satya rataḥ kalāsu nipuṇaḥ śāstra arthavid dhārmikaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.06b: / medhāvī surata priyaḥ para gṛhair vittaiś ca saṃyujyate/kanyāyāṃ para deśagaḥ priya vacāḥ kanyā prajo alpa ātmajaḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.07a: / deva brāhmaṇa sādhu pūjana rataḥ prājñaḥ śuciḥ strī jitaḥ prāṃśuś ca unnata nāsikaḥ kṛśa calad gātro aṭano artha anvitaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.07b: / hīna aṅgaḥ kraya vikrayeṣu kuśalo deva dvi nāmā sa ruk bandhūnām upakāra kṛd viruṣitas tyaktas tu taiḥ saptame//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.08a: / pṛthula nayana vakṣā vṛtta jaṅgha ūru jānur janaka guru viyuktaḥ śaiśave vyādhitaś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.08b: / nara pati kula pūjyaḥ piṅgalaḥ krūra ceṣṭo jhaṣa kuliśa khaga aṅkaś channa pāpo alijātaḥ//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.09a: / vyādirgha āsya śiro dharaḥ pitṛ dhanas tyāgī kavir vīryavān/vaktā sthūla rada śravo adhara nasaḥ karma udyataḥ śilpavit/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.09b: / kubja aṃśaḥ kunakhī sama aṃsala bhujaḥ prāgalbhavān dharmavid/bandhu dviṭ na balāt samaiti ca vaṃśa sāmna eka sādhyo aśvajaḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.10a: / nityaṃ lālayati sva dāra tanayān dharma dhvajo adhaḥ kṛśaḥ/svakṣaḥ kṣāma kaṭir gṛhīta vacanaḥ saubhāgya yukto alasaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.10b: / śītālur manujo aṭanaś ca makare satva adhikaḥ kāvya kṛl lubdho agamya jara aṅganāsu nirataḥ santyakta lajjo aghṛṇaḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.11a: / karabha galaḥ śirāluḥ khara lomaśa dīrgha tanuḥ pṛthu caraṇa ūru pṛṣṭha jaghana āsya kaṭir jaraṭhaḥ//
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.11b: / para vanitā artha pāpa nirataḥ kṣaya vṛddhi yutaḥ priya kusuma anulepana suhṛd ghaṭajo adhva sahaḥ//(troṭaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.12a: / jala para dhana bhoktā dāra vāso anuraktaḥ sama rucira śarīras tuṅga nāso bṛhatkaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.12b: / abhibhavati sa patnān strī jitaś cāru dṛṣṭir dyuti nidhi dhana bhogī paṇḍitaś ca antya rāśau//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.13a: / balavati rāśau tad adhipatau ca sva bala yutaḥ syād yadi tuhina aṃśuḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_17.13b: / kathita kalānām avikala dātā śaśivad ato anye ity anuparicintyāḥ//(bhramaravilasita)E17
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.01a: / prathitaś caturo aṭano alpa vittaḥ kriyage tv āyudha bhṛd vituṅga bhāge/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.01b: / gavi vastra sugandha paṇya jīvī vanitād viṭ kuśalaś ca go yava ādye//(aupacchandasika)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.02a: / vidyā jyotiṣa vittavān mithunage bhānau kulīre sthite tīkṣṇo asvaḥ para kārya kṛc chrama patha kleśaiś ca saṃyujyate/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.02b: / siṃhasthe vana śaila go kula ratir vīrya anvito ajñaḥ pumān kanyāsthe lipi lekhya kāvya gaṇita jñāna anvitaḥ strī vapuḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.03a: / jātas taulini sauṇḍiko adhvani rato hairaṇyako nīca kṛt krūraḥ sāhasiko viśa arjita dhanaḥ śastra antago ali sthite/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.03b: / sat pūjyo dhanavān dhanur dhara gate tīkṣṇo bhiṣak kāruko nīco ajñaḥ kuvaṇiṅ mṛge alpa dhanavāṃl labdho anya bhāgyair rataḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.04a: / nīco ghaṭe tanaya bhāgya pariccyuto asva stoya uttha paṇya vibhavo banitād ṛto antye/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.04b: / nakṣatra mānava tanu pratime vibhāge lakṣma ādiśet tuhina raśmi dina īśa yukte//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.05a: / nara pati sat kṛto aṭanaś camūpa vaṇik sa dhanaḥ kṣata tanuś caura bhūri viṣayāṃś ca kujaḥ sva gṛhe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.05b: / yuvati jitān suhṛtsu viṣamān para dāra ratān kuhaka suveṣa bhīru paurṣān sita bhe janayet//(troṭaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.06a: / baudhe asahas tanayavān visuhṛt kṛtajño gāndharva yuddha kuśalaḥ kṛpaṇo abhayo arthī/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.06b: / cāndre arthavān salila yāna samarjita svaḥ prājñaś ca bhūmi tanaye vikalaḥ khalaś ca//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.07a: / niḥsvaḥ kleśa saho vana antara caraḥ siṃhe alpa dārā ātmajo jaive na eka ripur nara indra sacivaḥ khyāto abhaya alpa ātmajaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.07b: / duḥkha arto vidhano aṭano anṛta ratas tīkṣṇaś ca kumbha sthite bhaume bhūri dhana ātmajo mṛga gate bhūpo atha vā tat samaḥ//(ā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.08a: / dyūta ṛṇa pāna rata nāstika caura niḥsvāḥ kustrīka kūṭakṛd asatya ratāḥ kuja ṛkṣe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.08b: / ācārya bhūri suta dāra dhana arjana iṣṭāḥ śaukre vadāny aguru bhakti ratāś ca saumye//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.09a: / vikatthanaḥ śāstra kalā vidagdhaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ saukhya ratas tṛtīye/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.09b: / jala arjita svaḥ sva janasya śatruḥ śaśa aṅkaje śīta kara ṛkṣa yukte//(upendravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.10a: / strī dveṣyo vidhana sukha ātmajo aṭano ajñaḥ strī lolaḥ sva paribhavo arka rāśige jñe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.10b: / tyāgī jñaḥ pracura guṇaḥ sukhī kṣamāvān yukti jño vigata bhayaś ca ṣaṣṭha rāśau//(praharṣiṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.11a: / para karma kṛd asva śilpa buddhī ṛṇavān viṣṭi karo budhe arkaja ṛkṣe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.11b: / nṛpa satkṛta paṇḍita āpta vākyo navame antye jita sevaka antya śilpaḥ//(aupacchandasika)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.12a: / senā nirbahu vitta dāra tanayo dātā subhṛtyaḥ kṣamī tejo dāra guṇa anvitaḥ sura gurau khyātaḥ pumān kauja bhe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.12b: / kalpa aṅgaḥ sa dhana artha mitra tanayas tyāgī priyaḥ śaukra bhe baudhe bhūri paricchada ātmaja suhṛt sācivya yuktaḥ sukhī//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.13a: / cāndre ratna suta sva dāra vibhava prajñā sukhair anvitaḥ/siṃhe syād bala nāyakaḥ sura gurau proktaṃ ca yac canra bhe//
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.13b: / sva ṛkṣe māṇḍaliko nara indra sacivaḥ senāpatir vā dhanī/kumbhe karkaṭavat phalāni makare nīco alpa vitto asukhī//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.14a: / para yuvati ratas tad artha vādair hṛta vibhavaḥ kula pāṃsanaḥ kuja ṛkṣe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.14b: / sva bala mati dhano nara indra pūjyaḥ sva jana vibhuḥ prathito abhayaḥ site sve//(puṣpitāgrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.15a: / nṛpa kṛtya karo arthavān kalāvin mithune ṣaṣṭha gate atinīca karmā
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.15b: / ravija ṛkṣa gate amara ari pūjye subhagaḥ strī vijito rataḥ kunāryyām//(aupacchandasika)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.16a: / dvi bhāryo arthī bhīruḥ prabala mada śokaś ca śaśi bhe harau yoṣā āpta arthaḥ pravara yuvatir manda tanayaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.16b: / guṇaiḥ pūjyaḥ sa svas turaga sahite dānava gurau jhaṣe vidvān āḍhyo nṛpa janita pūjo atisubhagaḥ//(śikhariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.17a: / mūrkho aṭanaḥ kapaṭavān visuhṛd yame aje kīṭe tu bandha vadha bhāk capalo aghṛṇaś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.17b: / nihrīr sukha artha tanayaḥ skhalitaś ca lekhye rakṣā patir bhavati mukhya patiś ca baudhe//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.18a_0: / varjya strī iṣṭo na bahu vibhavo bhūri bhāryo vṛṣasthe khyātaḥ sva ucce gaṇa pura
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.18a_1: bala grāma pūjyo arthavāṃś ca karkiṇy asvo vikala daśano mātṛ hīno asuto ajñaḥ siṃhe
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.18a_2: anāryo bisukha tanayo viṣṭi kṛt sūrya putre //(mandākrāntā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.19a: / svantaḥ pratyayito nara indra bhavane sat putra jāyā dhano jīva kṣetra gate arkaje pura bala grāma agra netā atha vā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.19b: / anya strī dhana saṃvṛtaḥ pura bala grāma agraṇīr manda dṛk sva kṣetre malinaḥ sthira artha vibhavo bhoktā ca jātaḥ pumān//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.20a: / śiśira kara samāgama īkṣaṇānāṃ sadṛśa phalaṃ pravadanti lagna jātam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_18.20b: / phalam adhikam idaṃ yad atra bhāvād bhavana bha nātha guṇair vicintanīyam//(puṣpitāgrā)E18
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.01a: / candre bhūpa budhau nṛpa upama guṇī steno adhanaś ca ajage niḥsvaḥ stena nṛ mānya bhūpa dhaninaḥ preṣyaḥ kuja ādyair gavi/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.01b: / nṛsthe ayo vyavahāri pārthiva budhābhis tantu vāyo adhano sva ṛkṣe yoddhṛ kavi jña bhūmi patayo ayo jīvi dṛg rogiṇau//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.02a: / jyotir jña āḍhya nara indra nāpita nṛ pakṣma īśā budha ādyair harau tad vad bhūpa camūpa naipuṇa yutāḥ ṣaṣṭhe aśubhaiḥ stry āśrayaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.02b: / jūke bhūpa suvarṇa kāra vaṇijaḥ śeṣa īkṣite naikṛtī kīṭe yugma pitā nataś ca rajako vyaṅgo adhano bhūpatiḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.03a: / jñāty urvī īśa jana āśrayaś ca turage pāpaiḥ sad ambhaḥ śaṭhaś ca atyurvī īśa nara indra paṇḍita dhanī dravya ūna bhūpo mṛge/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.03b: / bhūpo bhūpa samo anya dāra nirataḥ śeṣaiś ca kumbha sthite hāsyajño nṛpatir budhaś ca jhaṣage pāpaś ca pāpa īkṣite//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.04a: / horā īśa ṛkṣa dala āśritaiḥ śubha karo dṛṣṭaḥ śaśī tad gatas try aṃśe tat patibhiḥ suhṛd bhavanagair vā vīkṣitaḥ śasyate/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.04b: / yat proktaṃ prati rāśi vīkṣaṇa phalaṃ tad dvādaśa aṃśe smṛtaṃ sūrya udyair avalokite api śaśini jñeyaṃ nava aṃśeṣv ataḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.05a: / ārakṣiko vadha ruchiḥ kuśalo niyuddhe bhūpo arthavān kalaha kṛt kṣitija aṃśa saṃsthe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.05b: / mūrkho anya dāra nirataḥ sukaviḥ sita aṃśe sat kāvya kṛt sukha paro anya kalatragaś ca//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.06a: / baudhe hi raṅga cara caura kavi indra mantrī geya jña śilpa nipuṇaḥ śaśini sthite aṃśe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.06b: / sva aṃśe alpa gātra dhana lubdha tapasvi mukhyaḥ strīpo apy akṛtya nirataś ca nirīkṣyamāṇaṃ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.07a: / sa krodho nara pati saṃmato nidhi īśaḥ siṃha aṃśe prabhura suto atihiṃsra karmā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.07b: / jīva aṃśe prathita balo raṇa upadeṣṭā hāsya jñaḥ saciva vikāma vṛddha śīlaḥ//(praharṣiṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.08a: / alpa apatyo duḥkhitaḥ saty api sve māna āsaktaḥ karmaṇi sve anuraktaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.08b: / duṣṭa strī iṣtaḥ kṛpaṇaś ca arki bhāge candre bhānau tadvad indv ādi dṛṣṭe//(śālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.09a: / varga uttama sva parageṣu śubhaṃ yad uktaṃ tat puṣṭa madhya laghutā śubham utkrameṇa/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_19.09b: / vīrya anvito aṃśaka patir niruṇaddhi pūrvaṃ rāśī kṣaṇasya phalam aṃśa phalaṃ dadāti//(va ti)E19
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.01a: / śūraḥ stabdho vikala nayano nirghṛṇo arke tanusthe/meṣe sa svas timira nayanaḥ siṃha saṃsthe niśā adhaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.01b: / nīce andho asvaḥ śaśi gṛha gate budbuda akṣaḥ pataṅge bhūri dravyo nṛpa hṛta dhano vakra rogī dvitīye//(mandākrāntā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.02a: / mati vikramāṃs tṛtīyage arke visukhaḥ pīḍita mānaśaś caturthe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.02b: / asuto dhana varjitas tri koṇe balavāñ chatru jitaś ca śatru yāte//(aupacchandasika)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.03a: / strībhir gataḥ paribhavaṃ madage pataṅge svalpa ātmajo nidhanage vikala īkṣaṇaś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.03b: / dharme suta artha sukha bhāk sukha śaurya bhāk khe lābhe prabhūta dhanavān patitas tu riḥphe//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.04a: / mūka unmatta jaḍa andha hīna badhira preṣyāḥ śaśa aṅka udaye/sva ṛkṣaja ucca gate dhanī bahu sutaḥ sa svaḥ kuṭumbī dhane/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.04b: / hiṃsro bhrātṛ gate sukhe sa tanaye tat prokta bhāva anvito naikārir mṛdu kāya vahni madanas tīkṣṇo alasaś ca arige//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.05a: / īrṣus tīvra mado made bahu matir vyādhy arditaś ca aṣṭame/saubhāgya ātmaja mitra bandhu dhana bhāg dharma sthite śītagau/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.05b: / niṣpattiṃ samupaiti dharma dhana dhī śauryair yutaḥ karmage kyāto bhāva guṇa anvito bhava gate kṣudro aṅga hīno vyaye//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.06a: / lagne kuje kṣata tanur dhanage kad anno dharme aghavān dina kara pratimo anya saṃsthaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.06b: / vidvān dhanī prakhala paṇḍita mantry aśatrur dharmajña viśruta guṇaḥ parato arkavaj jñe//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.07a: / vidvān suvākyaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ sukhī ca dhī māna śatruḥ pitṛto adhikaś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.07b: / nīcas tapasvī sa dhanaḥ sa lābhaḥ khalaś ca jīve kramaśo vilagnāt//(idravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.08a: / smara nipuṇaḥ sukhitaś ca vilagne priya kalaho asta gate surata īpsuḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.08b: / tanaya gate sukhito bhṛgu putre guru vadato anya gṛhe sa dhano antye//(citratā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.09a: / adṛṣṭa artho rogī madana vaśago atyanta malinaḥ śiśutve pīḍā ārtaḥ savitṛ suta lagna ity alasa vāk/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.09b: / guru sva ṛkṣa uccasthe nṛ pati sadṛśo grāma purapaḥ suvidvāṃś cārv aṅgo dina kara samo anyatra kathitaḥ//(śikhariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.10a: / suhṛd ari parakīya sva ṛkṣa tuṅga sthitānāṃ phalam anuparicintyaṃ lagna deha ādi bhāvaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.10b: / samupacaya vipattī saumya pāpeṣu satyaḥ kathayati viparītaṃ riḥpha ṣaṣṭha aṣṭa bheṣu//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.11a: / ucca tri koṇa sva suhṛc chatru nīca gṛha arkagaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_20.11b: / śubhaṃ sampūrṇa pāda ūna dala pāda alpa niṣphalam//(anuṣṭubh)E20
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.01a: / kula sama kula mukhya bandhu pūjyā dhani sukhi bhogi nṛpāḥ sva bha eka vṛddhyā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.01b: / para vibhava suhṛt sva bandhu poṣyā gaṇapa bala īśa nṛpāś ca mitra bheṣu//(puṣpitāgrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.02a: / janayati nṛpam eko apy uccago nitra dṛṣṭaḥ pracura dhana sametaṃ mitra yogāc ca siddham/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.02b: / vidhana visukha mūḍha vyādhito bandha tapto vadha durita sametaḥ śatru nīca ṛkṣageṣu//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.03a: / na kumbha lagnaṃ śubham āha satyo na bhāga bhedād yavanā vadanti/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.03b: / kasya aṃśa bhedo na tathā asti rāśer atiprasaṅgas tv iti viṣṇu guptaḥ//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.04a: / yāteṣu asat sva sama bheṣu dina īśa horāṃ khyāto mahā udyama bala artha yuto atitejāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.04b: / cāndrīṃ śubheṣu yuji mārdava kānti saukhya saubhāgya dhī madhura vākya yutaḥ prajātaḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.05a: / tāsv eva horā sva para ṛkṣageṣu jñeyā narāḥ pūrva gaṇeṣu madhyāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.05b: / vyatyasta horā bhavana sthiteṣu martyā bhavanty ukta guṇair vihīnāḥ//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.06a: / kalyāṇa rūpa guṇam ātma suhṛd dṛkoṇe candro anyagas tad adhinātha guṇaṃ karoti/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.06b: / vyāla udyaya āyudha catuś caraṇa aṇḍajeṣu tīkṣṇo atihiṃsra guru talpa rato aṭanaś ca//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.07a: / steno bhoktā paṇḍita āḍhyo narendraḥ klībaḥ śūro viṣṭikṛd dāsa vṛttiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.07b: / pāpo hiṃsro abhīś ca varga uttama aṃśeṣv eṣām īṣā rāśivad dvādaśa aṃśaiḥ//(śālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.08a: / jāyā anvito bala vibhūṣaṇa satva yuktos tejo atisāhasa yutaś ca kuje sva bhāge/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.08b: / rogī mṛta sva yuvatir viṣamo anya dāro duḥkhī paricchada yuto malino arka putre//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.09a: / sva aṃśe gurau dhana yaśaḥ sukha buddhi yuktās tejasvi pūjya nirug udyama bhogavantaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.09b: / medhā kalāka paṭa kāvya vivāda śilpa śāstra artha sāhasa yutāḥ śaśije atimānyāḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.10a: / sve triṃśa aṃśe bahu suta sukha ārogya bhāgya artha rūpaḥ śukre tīkṣṇaḥ sulalita vapuḥ suprakīrṇa indriyaś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_21.10b: / śūra stabdhau viṣama vadhakau sad guṇa āḍhyau sukhijau cārv aṅge aṣṭau ravi śaśi yuteṣv āra pūrva aṃśakeṣu//(mandākrāntā)E21
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.01a: / sva ṛkṣa tuṅga mūla tri koṇagāḥ kaṇṭakeṣu yāvanta āśritāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.01b: / sarva eva te anyonya kārakāḥ karmagas tu teṣāṃ viśeṣataḥ//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.02a: / karkaṭa udaya gate yathā uḍupe sva uccagāḥ kuja yama arka sūrayaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.02b: / kārakā nigaditāḥ parasparaṃ lagnagasya sakalo ambara ambugaḥ//(rathoddhatā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.03a: / sva tri koṇa uccago hetur anyonyaṃ yadi carmagaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.03b: / suhṛt tad guṇa sampannaḥ kārakaś ca api sa smṛtaḥ//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.04a: / śubhaṃ varga uttame janma veśi sthāne ca sad gṛhe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.04b: / aśūnyeṣu ca kendreṣu kārakā ākhya graheṣu ca//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.05a: / madhye vayasaḥ sukha pradāḥ kendrasthā guru janma lagnapāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.05b: / pṛṣṭha ubhayaka udaya ṛkṣagās tv ante antaḥ prathameṣu pākadāḥ//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.06a: / dina kara rudhirau praveṣa kāle guru bhṛgujau bhavanasya madhya yātau/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_22.06b: / ravi suta śaśinau vinirgamasthau śaśi tanayaḥ phaladas tu sarva kālam//(puṣpitāgrā)E22
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.01a: / lagnāt putra kalatra bhe śubha pati prāpte atha vā ālokite candrād vā yadi sampad asti hi tayor jñeyo anyathā saṃbhavaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.01b: / pāthā ūna udayage ravau ravi suto mīna sthito dārahā putra sthāna gataś ca putra maraṇaṃ putro avaner yacchati//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.02a: / ugra grahaiḥ sita caturasra saṃsthitair madhya sthite bhṛgu tanaye atha vā ugrayoḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.02b: / saumya grahair asahita saṃnirīkṣite jāyā vadho dahana nipāta pāśajaḥ//(praharṣiṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.03a: / lagnād vyaya ari gatayoḥ śaśi tigma raśmyoḥ patnyā saha eka nayanasya vadanti janma/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.03b: / dyūnasthayor navama pañcama saṃsthayor vā śukra arkayor vikala dāram uśanti jātam//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.04a: / koṇa udaye bhṛgu tanaye asta cakra saṃdhau vandhyā patir yadi na suta ṛkṣam iṣṭa yuktam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.04b: / pāpa grahair vyaya mada lagna rāśi saṃsthaiḥ kṣīṇe śaśiny asuta kalatra janma dhīsthe//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.05a: / asita kujayor varge astasthe site tad avekṣite para yuvatigas tau cet sa indu striyā saha puṃś calaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.05b: / bhṛguja śaśinor aste abhāryo naro visuto api vā pariṇata tanū nṛ stryor dṛṣṭau śubhaiḥ pramadā patī//(hariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.06a: / vaṃśa cchettā kha mada sukhagaiś candra daityejya pāpaiḥ/śilpī try aṃśe śaśi suta yute kendra saṃstha arki dṛṣṭe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.06b: / dāsyāṃ jāto diti suta gurau riḥphage saura bhāge/nīco arkendrvor madana gatayor dṛṣṭayoḥ sūryajena//(mandākrāntā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.07a: / pāpa ālokitayoḥ sita avanijayor astasthayor vā adhyaruk candre karkaṭa vṛścika aṃśaka gate pāpair yute guhya ruk/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.07b: / śvi trī riḥpha dhanasthayor aśubhayoś candra udaye aste ravau candre khe avanije astage ca vikalo yady arkajo veśigaḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.08a: / antaḥ śaśiny aśubhayor mṛgage pataṅge śvāsa kṣaya plihaka vidradhi gulma bhājaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.08b: / śoṣī paraspara gṛha aṃśa gayor ravi indvoḥ kṣetre atha vā yugapad ekagayoḥ kṛśo vā//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.09a: / cendre aśvi madhya jhaṣa karki mṛga aja bhāge kuṣṭhī sa manda rudhire tad avekṣite vā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.09b: / yātais tri koṇam ali karki vṛṣair mṛge ca kuṣṭhī ca pāpa sahitair avalokitair vā//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.10a: / nidhana ari dhana vyaya sthitā ravi candra āra yamā yathā tathā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.10b: / balavad graha doṣa kāraṇair manujānāṃ janayanty anetratām//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.11a: / navama āya tṛtīya dhī yutā na ca saumyair aśubhā nirīkṣitāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.11b: / niyamāc chravaṇa upaghātadā rada vaikṛtya karāś ca saptame//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.12a: / udayaty uḍupe sura asyage sa piśāco aśubhayos tri koṇayoḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.12b: / sa upaplava maṇḍale ravāv udayasthe nayana apavarjitaḥ//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.13a: / saṃspṛṣṭaḥ pavanena mandaga yute dyūne vilagne gurau sa unmādo avanije sthite asta bhavane jīve vilagna āśrite/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.13b: / tadvat sūrya suta udaye avani sute dharma ātmaja dyūnage jāto vāsa sahasra raśmi tanaye kṣīṇe vyaye śītagau//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.14a: / rāśy aṃśapa uṣṇa kara śīta kara amarejyair nīca adhipa aṃśa gatair ari bhāgagair vā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.14b: / ebhyo alpa madhya bahubhiḥ kramaśaḥ prasūtā jñeyāḥ syur abhyupagama kraya garbha dāsaāḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.15a: / vikṛta daśanaḥ pāpair dṛṣṭe vṛṣa aja haya udaye khalatir aśubha kṣetre lagne haye vṛṣa bhe api vā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.15b: / navama sutage pāpair dṛṣṭe ravāv adṛḍha īkṣaṇo dina kara sute na eka vyādhiḥ kuje vikalaḥ pumān//(hariṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.16a: / vyaya suta dhana dharmagair asaumyair bhavana sa māna nibandhanaṃ vikalpyam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.16b: / bhuja gani gaḍa pāśabhṛd dṛkāṇair balavad asaumya nirīkṣitaiś ca tadvat//(puṣpitāgrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.17a: / puruṣa vacano apasmāra ārtaḥ kṣayī ca niśā patau sa ravi tanaye vakra ālokaṃ gate pariveṣage/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_23.17b: / ravi yama kujaiḥ saumya adṛṣṭair nabhaḥ sthalam āśritair bhṛtaka manujaḥ pūrva uddiṣṭair vara adhama madhyamāḥ//(hariṇī)E23
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.01a: / yad yat phalaṃ nara bhave kṣamam aṅganānāṃ tat tad vadet patiṣu vā sakalaṃ vidheyam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.01b: / tāsāṃ tu bhartṛ maraṇaṃ nidhane vapus tu lagna indugaṃ subhagatā astamaye patiś ca//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.02a: / yugmeṣu lagna śaśinoḥ prakṛti sthitā strī sac chīla bhūṣaṇa yutā śubha dṛṣṭayoś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.02b: / ojasthayoś ca manuja ākṛti śīla yuktā pāpā ca pāpa yuta īkṣitayor guṇa ūnā//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.03a: / kanyā eva duṣṭā vrajati iha dāsyaṃ sādhvī sa māyā kucaritra yuktā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.03b: / bhūmy ātmaja ṛkṣe kramaśo aṃśakeṣu vakra arki jīva induja bhārgavānam//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.04a: / duṣṭā punarbhūḥ sa guṇā kalājñā khyātā guṇaiś ca asura pūjita ṛkṣe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.04b: / syāt kāpaṭī klība samā satī ca baudhe guṇa āḍhyā pravikīrṇakāmā//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.05a: / sva cchandā pati ghātinī bahu guṇā śilpiny asādhvī indu bhe/nrācārā kulaṭa arka bhe nṛpa vadhūḥ puṃś ceṣṭita āgamyagā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.05b: / jaivena ekaguṇa alpa raty atiguṇā vijñāna yuktā satī/dāsī nīca rata arki bhe pati ratā duṣṭā prajā sva aṃśakaiḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.06a: / śaśi lagna samāyuktaiḥ phalaṃ triṃśa aṃśakair idam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.06b: / bala abala vikalpena tayor uktaṃ vicintayet//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.07a: / dṛk saṃstha avasita sitau paraspara aṃśe śaukre vā yadi ghaṭa rāśi saṃbhavo aṃśaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.07b: / strībhiḥ strī madana viṣa anala pradīptaṃ saṃśāntiṃ nayati nara ākṛti sthitābhiḥ//(praharṣiṇī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.08a: / śūnye kāpuruṣo bale asta bhavane saumya grahāv īkṣite klīvo aste budha mandayoś cara gṛhe nityaṃ pravāsa anvitaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.08b: / utsṛṣṭā raviṇā kujena vidhavā vālye asta rāśi sthite kanyā eva aśubha vīkṣite arka tanaye dyūne jarāṃ gacchati//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.09a: / āgneyair vidhavā asta rāśi sahitair miśraiḥ punarbhūr bhavet/krūre hīna bale astage sva patinā saumya īkṣite projjhitā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.09b: / anyonya aṃśagayoḥ sita avanijayor anya prasakta aṅganā/dyūne vā yadi śīta raśmi sahitau bhartus tadā anujñayā//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.10a: / saura āra ṛkṣe lagnage sa indu śukre matrā sārddhaṃ bandhakī pāpa dṛṣṭe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.10b: / kauje asta aṃśe sauriṇā vyādhi yoniś cāru śroṇī vallabhā sad graha aṃśe//(śālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.11a: / vṛddho mūrkhaḥ sūryaja ṛkṣe aṃśake vā strī lolaḥ syāt krodhanaś ca avaneye/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.11b: / śaukre kānto atīva saubhāgya yukto vidvān bhartā naipuṇa jñaś ca baudhe//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.12a: / madana vaśa gato mṛduś ca cāndre tri daśa gurau guṇavān jita indriyaś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.12b: / atimṛdu rati karma kṛc ca saurye bhavati gṛhe astamaya sthite aṃśake vā//(puṣpitāgrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.13a: / īrṣya anvitā sukha parā śaśi śukra lagne jña indvoḥ kalāsu nipuṇā sukhitā guṇa āḍhyā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.13b: / śukra jñayos tu rucirā subhagā kalājñā triṣv apy aneka vasu saukhya guṇā śubheṣu//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.14a: / krūre aṣṭame vidhavatā nidhana īśvaro aṃśe yasya sthito vayasi tasya same pradiṣṭā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.14b: / sat svarthageṣu maraṇaṃ svayam eva tasyāḥ kanyā aligo hariṣu ca alpa sutatvam indau//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.15a: / saure madhya bale balena rahitaiḥ śīta aṃśu śukra indujaiḥ/śeṣair vīrya samanvitaiḥ paruṣiṇī yady oja rāśy udgamaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.15b: / jīva āra sphuji daindaveṣu baliṣu prāg lagna rāśau same/vikhyātā bhuvi na eka śāstra nipuṇā strī brahma vādiny api//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.16a: / pāpe aste navama gata grahasya tulyāṃ pravrajyāṃ yuvatir upaity asaṃśayena/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_24.16b: / udvāhe varaṇa vidhau pradāna kāle cintāyām api sakalaṃ vidheyam etat (praharṣiṇī)E24
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.01a: / mṛtyur mṛtyu gṛha īkṣaṇena balibhis tad dhātu kopa udbhavas tat saṃyukta bha gātrajo bahu bhavo vīrya anvitair bhūribhiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.01b: / agny aṃbv āyudhajo jvara āmaya kṛtas tṛṭ kṣut kṛtaś ca aṣṭame sūrya ādyair nidhane cara ādiṣu para sva adhva pradeśeṣv iti//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.02a: / śaila agra abhihatasya sūrya kujayor mṛtyuḥ kha bandhusthayoḥ kūpe manda śaśa aṅka bhūmi tanayair bandhv asta karma sthitaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.02b: / kanyāyāṃ sva janād dhima uṣṇa karayoḥ pāpa grahair dṛṣṭayoḥ syātāṃ yady ubhaya udaye arka śaśinau toye tadā majjitaḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.03a: / mande karkaṭage jala udara kṛto mṛtyur mṛga aṅke mṛge śastra agni prabhavaḥ śaśiny aśubhayor madhye kuja ṛkṣe sthite/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.03b: / kanyāyāṃ rudhira uttha śoṣa janitas tadvat sthite śītagau saura ṛkṣe yadi tadvad eva himagau rajjv agni pātaiḥ kṛtaḥ//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.04a: / bandhād dhī navamas tayor aśubhayoḥ saumya grahād dṛṣṭayor dreṣkāṇaiś ca sa pāśa sarpa nigaḍaiś chidra sthitair bandhataḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.04b: / kanyāyām aśubha anvite astamayage candre site meṣage sūrye lagna gate ca viddhi maraṇaṃ strī hetukaṃ mandire//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.05a: / śūla udbhinna tanuḥ sukhe avani sute sūrye api vā khe yame/sa prakṣīṇa hima aṃśubhiś ca yugapat pāpais tri koṇa ādyagaiḥ//
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.05b: / bandhusthe ca ravau viyaty avanije kṣīṇa indu saṃvīkṣite/kāṣṭhena abhihataḥ prayāti maraṇaṃ sūrya ātmajena īkṣite//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.06a: / randhra āspada aṅga hibukair laguḍa āhata aṅgaḥ prakṣīṇa candra rudhira arki dina īśa yuktaiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.06b: / tair eva karma navama udaya putra saṃsthair dhūma agni bandhana śarīra nikuṭṭana antaḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.07a: / bandhv asta karma sahitaiḥ kuja sūrya mandair niryāṇam āyudha śikhi kṣiti pāla kopāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.07b: / saura indu bhūmi tanayaiḥ sva sukha āspadasthair jñeyaḥ kṣata kṛmi kṛtaś ca śarīra ghātaḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.08a: / khasthe arke avanije rasātala gate yāna prapātad vadho/yantra utpīḍanajaḥ kuje astamayage saura indunā abhyudgame/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.08b: / viṇ madhye rudhira arki śīta kiraṇair jūka aja saura ṛkṣagair yāte vā galita indu sūrya rudhirair vyoma asta bandhv āhvayān//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.09a: / vīrya anvita vakra vīkṣite kṣīṇa indau nidhana sthite arkaje/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.09b: / guhya udbhava roga pīḍayā mṛtyuḥ syāt kṛmi śastra dāhajaḥ//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.10a: / aste ravau sa rudhire nidhane arka putre kṣīṇe rasātala gate himagau khaga antaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.10b: / lagna ātmaja aṣṭama tapaḥsv ina bhauma manda candrais tu śaila śikhara aśani kuḍya pātaiḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.11a: / dvāviṃśaḥ kathitas tu kāraṇaṃ dreṣkāṇo nidhanasya sūribhiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.11b: / tasya adhipatir bhavo api vā niryāṇaṃ sva guṇaiḥ prayacchati//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.12a: / horā nava aṃśakapa yukta sa māna bhūmau yoga īkṣaṇa ādibhir ataḥ parikalpyam etat/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.12b: / mohas tu mṛtyu samaye anudita aṃśa tulyaḥ sva īśa īkṣite dvi guṇitas triguṇaḥ śubhaiś ca//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.13a: / dahana jala vimiśrair bhasma saṃkleda śoṣair nidhana bhavana saṃsthair vyāla vargair viḍantaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.13b: / iti śava pariṇāmaś cintanīyo yathā uktaḥ pṛthuvi racita śāstrād gaty anūka ādi cintyam//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.14a: / gurur uḍu pati śukrau sūrya bhaumau yama jñau vibudha/pitṛ tiraśco nārakīyāṃś ca kuryuḥ/
