GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.14b: / dina kara śaśi vīrya adhiṣṭhitāt try aṃśa nāthāt pravara sama nikṛṣṭās tuṅga hrasād anūke//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.15a: / gatir api ripu randhra try aṃśapo astasthito vā gurur atha ripu kendra cchidragaḥ sva ucca saṃsthaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_25.15b: / udayati bhavane antye saumya bhāge ca mokṣo bhavati yadi balena projjhitās tatra śeṣāḥ//(mālinī)E25
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.01a: / ādhāna janma aparibodha kāle sampṛcchato janma vaded vilagnāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.01b: / pūrva apara ardhe bhavanasya vindyād bhānāv udag dakṣiṇage prasūtim//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.02a: / lagna tri koṇeṣu gurus tri bhāgair vikalpya varṣāṇi vayo anumānāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.02b: / grīṣmo arka lagne kathitās tu śeṣair anyāyanartāvṛtur arka cārāt//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.03a: / canra jña jīvāḥ parivartanīyāḥ śukra āra mandair ayane vilome/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.03b: / dreṣkāṇa bhāge prathame tu pūrvo māso anupātāc ca tithir vikalpyaḥ//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.04a: / atra api horā paṭavo dvija indrāḥ sūrya aṃśa tulyāṃ tithim uddiśanti/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.04b: / rātri dyu saṃjñeṣu viloma janma bhāgaiś ca velāḥ kramaśo vikalpyāḥ//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.05a: / ke cic chaśa aṅka adhyuṣitān nava aṃśac chuklā anta saṃjñaṃ kathayanti māsam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.05b: / lagna tri koṇa uttama vīrya yuktaṃ samprocyate aṅga āla bhana ādibhir vā//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.06a: / yāvān gataḥ śīta karo vilagnāc candrād vadet tāvati janma rāśiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.06b: / mīna udaye mīna yugaṃ pradiṣṭaṃ bhakṣya āhṛta ākāra rutaiś ca cintyam//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.07a: / horā nava aṃśa pratimaṃ vilagnaṃ lagnād ravir yāvati ca dṛkāṇe/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.07b: / tasmād vadet tāvati vā vilagnaṃ praṣṭuḥ prasūtāv iti śāstram āha//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.08a: / janma ādiśel lagnage vīryage vā chāyā aṅgula ghner kahate avaśiṣṭam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.08b: / āsīna supta utthita tiṣṭhata ābhaṃ jāyā sukha ājña udayagaṃ pradiṣṭam//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.09a: / go siṃhau jituma aṣṭamau kriya tule kanyā mṛgau ca kramāt saṃvargyo daśaka aṣṭa sapta viṣayaiḥ śeṣāḥ sva saṃkhyā guṇāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.09b: / jīva āra āsphuji daindavāḥ prathamavac cheṣā grahāḥ saumyavad rāśīnaṃ niyato vidhir graha yutaiḥ kāryā ca tad vargaṇā//(śā vi)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.10a: / sapta āhataṃ tri ghana bhājita śeṣam ṛkṣaṃ dattvā atha vā nava viśodhya na vā atha vā asmāt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.10b: / evaṃ kalatra sahaja ātmaja śatru bhebhyaḥ praṣṭur vaded udaya rāśi vaśena teṣām//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.11a: / varṣa ṛtu māsa tithayo dyu niśaṃ hy ūḍūni vela udaye ṛkṣa nava bhāga vikalpanāḥ syuḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.11b: / bhūyo daśa ādi guṇitāḥ sva vikalpa bhaktā varṣa ādayo navaka dāna viśodhanābhyām//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.12a: / vijñeyā daśakeṣv abdā ṛtu māsās tathaiva ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.12b: / aṣṭakeṣv api māsād ardhās tithayaś ca tathā smṛtāḥ//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.13a: / divā rātri prasūtiṃ ca nakṣatra ānayanaṃ tathā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.13b: / saptakaṣv api vargeṣu nityam eva upalakṣayet//(anuṣṭubh)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.14a: / velām atha vilagnaṃ ca horām aṃśakam eva ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.15a: / saṃskāra nāma mātrā dvi guṇā chāyā aṅgulaiḥ samāyuktāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.15b: / śeṣaṃ tri navaka bhaktān nakṣatraṃ tad dhaniṣṭḥā ādi//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.16a: / dvi tri catur daśa daśa tithi sapta tri guṇā nava aṣṭa ca indra ādyāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.16b: / pañca daśaghnās tad diṅ mukha anvitā bha dhaniṣṭhā ādi//(āryā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.17a: / iti naṣṭa jātakam idaṃ bahu prakāraṃ mayā vinirdiṣṭam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_26.17b: / grāhyam ataḥ sac chiṣyaiḥ parīkṣya yantād yathā bhavati//(āryā)E26
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.01a: / kaṭyāṃ sita vastra veṣṭitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śakta iva abhirakṣitum/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.01b: / raudraḥ paraśuṃ samudyataṃ dhatte rakta vilocanaḥ pumān//(vaitālīyā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.02a: / raktam ambarā bhūṣaṇa bhakṣya cintā kumbha ākṛtir vāji mukhī tṛṣa ārtā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.02b: / ekena pādena ca meṣa madhye dreṣkāṇa rūpaṃ yavana upadiṣṭam//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.03a: / krūraḥ kalājñaḥ kapilaḥ kriyā arthī bhagna vrato abhyudya tad aṇḍa hastaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.03b: / raktāni vastrāṇi bibharti caṇḍo meṣe tṛtīyaḥ kathitas tri bhāgaḥ//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.04a: / kuñcita lūna kacā ghaṭa dehā dagdha paṭā tṛṣita āśana cittā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.04b: / ābharaṇāny abhivāñchati nārī rūpam idaṃ vṛṣa bhe prathamasya//(dodhaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.05a: / kṣetra dhānya gṛha dhenu kalājño lāṅgale sa śakaṭe kuśalaś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.05b: / skandham udvahati go pati tulyaṃ kṣut paro aja vadano mala vāsā//(svāgatā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.06a: / dvipa sama kāyaḥ pāṇḍura daṃṣṭraḥ śarabha sama aṅghriḥ piṅgala mūrtiḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.06b: / avi mṛga lobha vyākula citto vṛṣabha vanasya prānta gato ayam//(dodhaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.07a: / sūcya āśrayaṃ samabhivāñchati karma nārī rūpa anvita ābharaṇa kārya kṛta ādarā ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.07b: / hīna prajā ucchrita bhuja ṛtu matī tri bhāgam ādyaṃ tṛtīya bhavanasya vadanti tajjñāḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.08a: / udyāna saṃsthaḥ kavacī dhanuṣmāñ chūro astra dhārī garuḍa ānānāś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.08b: / krīḍā ātmaja alaṃkaraṇa artha cintāṃ karoti madhye mithunasya rāśeḥ//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.09a: / bhūṣito varuṇavad bahu ratno baddha tūṇa kavacaḥ sa dhanuṣkaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.09b: / nṛtta vādita kalāsu ca vidvān kāvya kṛn mithuna rāśy avasāne//(svāgatā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.10a: / patra mūla phala bhṛd dvipa kāyaḥ kānane malayagaḥ śarabha aṅghriḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.10b: / kroḍa tulya vadano haya kaṇṭhaḥ karkaṭe prathama rūpam uśanti//(svāgatā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.11a: / padma arcitā mūrdhani bhogi yuktā strī karka śāraṇya gatā virauti/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.11b: / śākhāṃ palāśasya samāśritā ca madhye sthitā karkaṭakasya rāśeḥ//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.12a: / bhāryā ābharaṇa artham arṇavaṃ naustho gacchati sarpa veṣṭitaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.12b: / haimaiś ca yuto vibhūṣaṇaiś cipiṭa āsya aṅtya gataś ca karkaṭe//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.13a: / śālmaler upari gṛdhra jambukau śvā naraś ca malinā ambara anvitaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.13b: / rauti mātṛ pitr viparyojitaḥ siṃha rūpam idam ādyam ucyate//(rathoddhatā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.14a: / haya ākṛtiḥ pāṇḍura mālya śekharo bibharti kṛṣṇa ajina kambalaṃ naraḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.14b: / durāsadaḥ siṃha iva atta kārmuko nata agra nāso mṛga rāja madhyamaḥ//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.15a: / ṛkṣa ānano vānara tulya ceṣṭo bibharti daṇḍaṃ phalam āmiṣaṃ ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.15b: / kūrcī manuṣyaḥ kuṭilaiś ca keśair mṛga īśvarasya antya gatas tri bhāgaḥ//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.16a: / puṣpa prapūrṇena ghaṭena kanyā mala pradigdha ambara saṃvṛta aṅgī/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.16b: / vastra artha saṃyogam abhīṣṭamānā guroḥ kulaṃ vāñchati kanyāka ādyaḥ//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.17a: / puruṣaḥ pragṛhīta lekhaniḥ śyāmo vastra śirā vyāyaya kṛt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.17b: / vipulaṃ ca bibharti kārmukaṃ roma vyāpta tanuś ca madhyamaḥ//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.18a: / gaurī sudhauta agra dukūla guptā samucchritā kumbha kaṭac chuhastā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.18b: / deva ālayaṃ strī prayatā pravṛttā vadanti kanyā antya gatas tri bhāgaḥ//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.19a: / vīthy antara apaṇa gataḥ puruṣas tulāvān unmāna māna kuśalaḥ pratimāna hastaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.19b: / bha aṇḍaṃ vicintayati tasya ca mūlyam etad rūpaṃ vadanti yavanāḥ prathamaṃ tulāyāḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.20a: / kalaśaṃ parigṛhya viniṣpatituṃ samabhīpsati gṛdhra mukhaḥ puruṣaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.20b: / kṣudhitas tṛṣitaś ca kalatra sutān manasā iti tulā dhara madhya gataḥ//(troṭaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.21a: / vibhīṣayaṃs tiṣṭhati ratna citrito vane mṛgān kāñcana tūṇa varma bhṛt/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.21b: / phala āmiṣaṃ vānara rūpabhṛn naras tulā vasāne yavanair udāhṛtaḥ//(vaṃśastha)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.22a: / vastrair vihīna ābharaṇaiś ca nārī mahā samudrāt samupaiti kūlam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.22b: / sthāna cyutā sarpa nibaddha pādā manoramā vṛścika rāśi pūrvaḥ//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.23a: / sthāna sukhāny abhivāñchati nārī bha ṛtu kṛte bhujaga āvṛta dehā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.23b: / kacchapa kumbha sa māna śarīrā vṛścika madhyama rūpam uśanti//(dodhaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.24a: / pṛthula cipiṭa kūrma tulya vakraḥ śva mṛga varāha sṛgāla bhīṣakārī/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.24b: / avati ca malayākara pradeśaṃ mṛga patir antya gatasya vṛścikasya//(puṣpitāgrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.25a: / manuṣya vakro aśva sa māna kāyo dhanur vigṛhya āyatam āśramasthaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.25b: / kratu upayojyāni tapasvinaś ca rarakṣa ādyo dhanuṣas tri bhāgaḥ//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.26a: / manoramā campaka hema varṇā bhadra āsane tiṣṭhati madhya rūpā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.26b: / samudra ratnāni vighaṭṭayantī madhya tri bhāgo dhanuṣaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.27a: / kūrcī naro hāṭaka campaka ābho vara āsane daṇḍa dharo niṣaṇṇaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.27b: / kauśeyakāny udvahate ajinaṃ ca tṛtīya rūpaṃ navamasya rāśeḥ//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.28a: / roma cito makara upama daṃṣṭraḥ sūkaraka āyasa māna śarīraḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.28b: / yoktraka jālaka bandhana dhārī raudra mukho makara prathamas tu//(dodhaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.29a: / kalāsv abhijñā abja dala āyata akṣī śyāmā vicitrāṇi ca mārgamāṇā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.29b: / vibhūṣaṇa alaṃkṛta loha karṇā yoṣā pradiṣṭā makarasya madhhye//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.30a: / kinnara upama tanuḥ sa kambalas tūṇa cāpa kavacaiḥ samanvitaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.30b: / kumbham udvahati ratna citritaṃ skandhagaṃ makara rāśi paścimaḥ//rathoddhatā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.31a: / sneha madya jala bhojana āgama vyākulī kṛta manāḥ sa kambalaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.31b: / kośa kāra vasano ajina anvito gṛdhra tulya vadano ghaṭa ādigaḥ//(dodhaka)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.32a: / dagdhe śakaṭe sa śālmale lohāny āharate aṅganā vane/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.32b: / malinena paṭena saṃvṛtā bhāṇḍair mūrdhni gataiś ca madhyamaḥ//(vaitālīya)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.33a: / śyāmaḥ sa roma śravaṇaḥ kirīṭī tvak patra niryāsa phalair bibharti/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.33b: / bhāṇḍāni loha vyatimiśritāni sañcārayanty anta gato ghaṭasya//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.34a: / srug bhāṇḍa muktāmaṇi śaṅkha misrair vyākṣipta hastaḥ sa vibhūṣaṇaś ca/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.34b: / bhāryā vibhūṣa artham apāṃ nidhānaṃ nāvā plavaty ādi gato jhaṣasya//(indravajrā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.35a: / atyucchrita dhvaja patākam upaiti potaṃ kūlaṃ prayāti jaladheḥ parivāra yuktā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.35b: / varṇena campaka mukhī pramadā tri bhāgo mīnasya ca eṣa kathito munibhir dvitīyaḥ//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.36a: / śvabhra antike sarpa niveṣṭita aṅgā vastrair vihīnaḥ puruṣas tv aṭavyām/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_27.36b: / caura anala vyākulita antara ātmā vikrośate antya upagato jhaṣasya//(indravajrā)E27
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.01a: / rāśi prabhedo graha yoni bhedo viyoni janma atha niṣeka kālaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.01b: / janma atha sadyo maraṇaṃ tathā āyur daśā vipāko aṣṭaka varga saṃjñaḥ//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.02a: / karma ājīvo rāja yogāḥ kha yogāś cāndrā yogād vigraha ādyāś ca yogāḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.02b: / pravraja atho rāśi śīlāni dṛṣṭir bhāvas tasmād āśrayo atha prakīrṇaḥ//(śālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.03a: / na iṣṭā yogā jātakaṃ kāminīnāṃ niryāṇaṃ syān na iṣṭa janma dṛkāṇaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.03b: / adhyāyānāṃ viṃśatiḥ pañca yuktā janmany etad yātrikaṃ ca abhidhāsye//(śālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.04a: / praśnās tithir bhaṃ divasaḥ kṣaṇaś ca candro vilagnaṃ tv atha lagna bhedaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.04b: / śuddhir grahāṇām atha cāpa vādo vimiśraka ākhyaṃ tanu vepanaṃ ca//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.05a: / ataḥ paraṃ guhyaka pūjanaṃ syāt svapnaṃ tataḥ snāna vidhiḥ pradiṣṭaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.05b: / yajño grahāṇām atha nirgamaś ca kramāc ca diṣṭaḥ śakuna upadeśaḥ//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.06a: / vivāha kālaḥ karaṇaṃ grahāṇāṃ proktaṃ pṛthak tad vipulā atha śākhā/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.06b: / skandhais tribhir jyotiṣa saṃgraho ayaṃ mayā kṛto daiva vidāṃ hitāya//(upajātikā)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.07a: / pṛthu viracitam anyaiḥ śāstram etat samastaṃ tad anu laghu mayā idaṃ tat pradeśa artham eva/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.07b: / kṛtam iha hi samarthaṃ dhī viṣāṇāmatve mama yadi ha yad uktaṃ saj janaiḥ kṣamyatāṃ tat//(mālinī)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.08a: / granthasya yā pracarato asya vināśam eti kekhvyāt bahu śrita mukha adhigama krameṇa/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.08b: / yad vā mayā kukṛtam alpam iha ākṛtaṃ vā kāryaṃ tad atra viduṣā parihṛtya rāgam//(va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.09a: / āditya dāsa tanayas tad avāpta bodhaḥ kāpitthake savitṛ labdha vara prasādaḥ/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.09b: / āvantiko muni matāny avalokya samyag ghorāṃ varāhamihiro rucirāṃ cakāra (va ti)
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.10a: / dina kara muni guru caraṇa praṇipāta kṛta prasāda matinā idam/
GS41brhajj_u:bj_28.10b: / śāstram upasaṃgṛhītaṃ namo astu pūrva pranetṛbhyaḥ//(āryā)E28
